BULBASAUR.Name: Bulbasaur

Abilities.Name: Poison Absorb
Abilities.Description: Grants immunity to Poison-type moves and restores HP if hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Thick Fat
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

BULBASAUR.Pokedex: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.

IVYSAUR.Name: Ivysaur

Abilities.Name: Poison Absorb
Abilities.Description: Grants immunity to Poison-type moves and restores HP if hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Thick Fat
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

IVYSAUR.Pokedex: To support its weight, Ivysaur's legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it spends more time lying in the sunlight, it's a sign that the bud will bloom soon.

VENUSAUR.Name: Venusaur

Abilities.Name: Poison Absorb
Abilities.Description: Grants immunity to Poison-type moves and restores HP if hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Thick Fat
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

VENUSAUR.Pokedex: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

CHARMANDER.Name: Charmander

Abilities.Name: Flame Body
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to burn the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Solar Power
Abilities.Description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

CHARMANDER.Pokedex: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

CHARMELEON.Name: Charmeleon

Abilities.Name: Flame Body
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to burn the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Solar Power
Abilities.Description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

CHARMELEON.Pokedex: In the rocky mountains where Charmeleon live, their fiery tails shine at night like stars.

CHARIZARD.Name: Charizard

Abilities.Name: Levitate
Abilities.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Solar Power
Abilities.Description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

CHARIZARD.Pokedex: If Charizard becomes furious, the flame at the tip of its tail flares up in a whitish-blue color.

SQUIRTLE.Name: Squirtle

Abilities.Name: Stormbringer
Abilities.Description: Summons rain for four turns when hit by an attack.

Abilities.Name: Mega Launcher
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of pulse moves by 50%.

SQUIRTLE.Pokedex: Its shell is not just for protection. Its rounded shape and the grooves on its surface minimize resistance in water, enabling Squirtle to swim at high speeds.

WARTORTLE.Name: Wartortle

Abilities.Name: Stormbringer
Abilities.Description: Summons rain for four turns when hit by an attack.

Abilities.Name: Mega Launcher
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of pulse moves by 50%.

WARTORTLE.Pokedex: Its large tail is covered with rich, thick fur that deepens in color with age. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon's toughness in battle.

BLASTOISE.Name: Blastoise

Abilities.Name: Stormbringer
Abilities.Description: Summons rain for four turns when hit by an attack.

Abilities.Name: Mega Launcher
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of pulse moves by 50%.

BLASTOISE.Pokedex: The jets of water it spouts from the rocket cannons on its shell can punch through thick steel.

CATERPIE.Name: Caterpie

Abilities.Name: Shield Dust
Abilities.Description: Blocks all random added effects of attacks taken.

CATERPIE.Pokedex: Its voracious appetite compels it to devour leaves bigger than itself without hesitation. It releases a terribly strong odor from its antennae.

METAPOD.Name: Metapod

Abilities.Name: Shed Skin
Abilities.Description: Heals from burn, frostbite, poison, numb, or leech at end of turn.

METAPOD.Pokedex: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

BUTTERFREE.Name: Butterfree

Abilities.Name: Fae Veil
Abilities.Description: Prevents itself and allies from being burned, frostbitten, or numbed.

Abilities.Name: Erudite
Abilities.Description: Powers up Psychic-type moves by 50%.

BUTTERFREE.Pokedex: Water-repellent powder on its wings enables it to collect honey, even in the heaviest of rains.

WEEDLE.Name: Weedle

Abilities.Name: Shield Dust
Abilities.Description: Blocks all random added effects of attacks taken.

WEEDLE.Pokedex: Predators not warned off by its brightly-colored body are jabbed with the toxic barb on its head.

KAKUNA.Name: Kakuna

Abilities.Name: Shed Skin
Abilities.Description: Heals from burn, frostbite, poison, numb, or leech at end of turn.

KAKUNA.Pokedex: It remains virtually immobile while it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it busily prepares for evolution. This is evident from how hot its shell becomes.

BEEDRILL.Name: Beedrill

Abilities.Name: Deep Sting
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 50%, but physical moves deal 25% damage back as recoil.

Abilities.Name: Predation
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to leech targets when using physical moves.

BEEDRILL.Pokedex: It prefers hit-and-run attacks using its powerful poison stingers, trying to evade blows to its fragile body.

PIDGEY.Name: Pidgey

Abilities.Name: No Guard
Abilities.Description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

Abilities.Name: Aeroshell
Abilities.Description: After using a wind move, raises both of the Pokémon's defensive stats.

PIDGEY.Pokedex: It has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It can unerringly return home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.

PIDGEOTTO.Name: Pidgeotto

Abilities.Name: No Guard
Abilities.Description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

Abilities.Name: Aeroshell
Abilities.Description: After using a wind move, raises both of the Pokémon's defensive stats.

PIDGEOTTO.Pokedex: This Pokémon flies around, patrolling its large territory. If its living space is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.

PIDGEOT.Name: Pidgeot

Abilities.Name: No Guard
Abilities.Description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

Abilities.Name: Aeroshell
Abilities.Description: After using a wind move, raises both of the Pokémon's defensive stats.

PIDGEOT.Pokedex: It spreads its gorgeous wings wide to intimidate enemies. It races through the skies at Mach 2.

RATTATA.Name: Rattata

Abilities.Name: Filthy
Abilities.Description: Immune to Poison-type moves, and boosts both defensive stats when hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Gnawing
Abilities.Description: Random added effects of bite attacks are +50% more likely likely to occur.

RATTATA.Pokedex: Cautious in the extreme, its hardy vitality lets it live in any kind of environment.

RATICATE.Name: Raticate

Abilities.Name: Filthy
Abilities.Description: Immune to Poison-type moves, and boosts both defensive stats when hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Gnawing
Abilities.Description: Random added effects of bite attacks are +50% more likely likely to occur.

RATICATE.Pokedex: With its long fangs, this surprisingly violent Pokémon can gnaw away even thick concrete with ease.

SPEAROW.Name: Spearow

Abilities.Name: Tough
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fighting- and Rock-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Territorial
Abilities.Description: Boosts damage by 20% if there is a weather. Immune to weather downsides.

SPEAROW.Pokedex: Farmers whose fields are troubled by bug Pokémon appreciate Spearow for its vigorous appetite and look after it.

FEAROW.Name: Fearow

Abilities.Name: Tough
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fighting- and Rock-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Territorial
Abilities.Description: Boosts damage by 20% if there is a weather. Immune to weather downsides.

FEAROW.Pokedex: Its long neck and elongated beak are ideal for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves this extended and skinny beak to pluck prey.

EKANS.Name: Ekans

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Constrictor
Abilities.Description: When hit with a physical move, hits back instantly with Bind.

EKANS.Pokedex: Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. Assuming this position allows it to quickly respond to a threat from any direction with a glare.

ARBOK.Name: Arbok

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Constrictor
Abilities.Description: When hit with a physical move, hits back instantly with Bind.

ARBOK.Pokedex: Transfixing prey with the face-like pattern on its belly, it binds and poisons the frightened victim.

PIKACHU.Name: Pikachu

Abilities.Name: Extreme Voltage
Abilities.Description: Increases Sp. Atk by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

Abilities.Name: Break Through
Abilities.Description: Moves ignore immunities due to typing.

PIKACHU.Pokedex: This intelligent Pokémon roasts hard berries with electricity to make them tender enough to eat.

RAICHU.Name: Raichu

Abilities.Name: Extreme Voltage
Abilities.Description: Increases Sp. Atk by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

Abilities.Name: Break Through
Abilities.Description: Moves ignore immunities due to typing.

RAICHU.Pokedex: If it stores too much electricity, its behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this, it occasionally discharges excess energy and calms itself down.

SANDSHREW.Name: Sandshrew

Abilities.Name: Sand Rush
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

Abilities.Name: Tough Claws
Abilities.Description: Increases Attack by 30%.

SANDSHREW.Pokedex: It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, this Pokémon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.

SANDSLASH.Name: Sandslash

Abilities.Name: Sand Rush
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

Abilities.Name: Tough Claws
Abilities.Description: Increases Attack by 30%.

SANDSLASH.Pokedex: Its claws and horns often break off. The broken claws and horns can be used to carve plows for tilling farm fields.

NIDORANfE.Name: Nidoran-F

Abilities.Name: Rugged Scales
Abilities.Description: Protected from random added effects. Takes 30% less damage from moves with random added effects.

Abilities.Name: Poison Punish
Abilities.Description: Special attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to poison the attacker.

NIDORANfE.Pokedex: Its highly toxic barbs are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied Pokémon. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.

NIDORINA.Name: Nidorina

Abilities.Name: Rugged Scales
Abilities.Description: Protected from random added effects. Takes 30% less damage from moves with random added effects.

Abilities.Name: Poison Punish
Abilities.Description: Special attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to poison the attacker.

NIDORINA.Pokedex: When Nidorina are with friends or family, they keep their barbs tucked away to prevent hurting each other. It becomes nervous if separated from the others.

NIDOQUEEN.Name: Nidoqueen

Abilities.Name: Rugged Scales
Abilities.Description: Protected from random added effects. Takes 30% less damage from moves with random added effects.

Abilities.Name: Poison Punish
Abilities.Description: Special attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to poison the attacker.

NIDOQUEEN.Pokedex: It pacifies offspring by placing them in the gaps between the spines on its back. The spines will never secrete poison while young are present.

NIDORANmA.Name: Nidoran-M

Abilities.Name: Sheer Force
Abilities.Description: Removes random added effects of attacks to increase their damage by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Poison Point
Abilities.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to poison the attacker.

NIDORANmA.Pokedex: Its large ears are flapped like wings when it is listening to distant sounds. It extends toxic barbs when angered.

NIDORINO.Name: Nidorino

Abilities.Name: Sheer Force
Abilities.Description: Removes random added effects of attacks to increase their damage by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Poison Point
Abilities.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to poison the attacker.

NIDORINO.Pokedex: It's nervous and quick to act aggressively. The potency of its poison increases along with the level of adrenaline present in its body.

NIDOKING.Name: Nidoking

Abilities.Name: Sheer Force
Abilities.Description: Removes random added effects of attacks to increase their damage by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Poison Point
Abilities.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to poison the attacker.

NIDOKING.Pokedex: When it goes on a rampage, it's impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it's lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.

CLEFAIRY.Name: Clefairy

Abilities.Name: Magic Guard
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

Abilities.Name: Luna Riot
Abilities.Description: Summons moonglow for four turns when hit by an attack.

CLEFAIRY.Pokedex: On every night of a full moon they come out to play. When dawn arrives, they return to their quiet mountain retreats and sleep nestled up against each other.

CLEFABLE.Name: Clefable

Abilities.Name: Magic Guard
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon only takes damage from attacks.

Abilities.Name: Luna Riot
Abilities.Description: Summons moonglow for four turns when hit by an attack.

CLEFABLE.Pokedex: A Clefable uses its wings to skip lightly as if it were flying. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. On quiet, moonlit nights, it strolls on lakes.

VULPIX.Name: Vulpix

Abilities.Name: Cursed Tail
Abilities.Description: When a foe hits the Pokémon, they are warned. If they hit the Pokémon again, they become Cursed.

Abilities.Name: Feedback
Abilities.Description: When attacked with a special move, inflicts 1/8th max HP damage on the attacker.

VULPIX.Pokedex: From its mouth spew flames that seem to resemble the spirits of the deceased. Some people mistakenly think this fire is a ghost.

NINETALES.Name: Ninetales

Abilities.Name: Cursed Tail
Abilities.Description: When a foe hits the Pokémon, they are warned. If they hit the Pokémon again, they become Cursed.

Abilities.Name: Feedback
Abilities.Description: When attacked with a special move, inflicts 1/8th max HP damage on the attacker.

NINETALES.Pokedex: Legend has it that this mystical Pokémon was formed when nine saints coalesced into one.

JIGGLYPUFF.Name: Jigglypuff

Abilities.Name: Staggering Slaps
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to dizzy targets when using physical moves.

Abilities.Name: Maestro
Abilities.Description: Doubles the speed of Sound-based moves.

JIGGLYPUFF.Pokedex: By freely changing the wavelength of its voice, Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to make any listener sleepy.

WIGGLYTUFF.Name: Wigglytuff

Abilities.Name: Staggering Slaps
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to dizzy targets when using physical moves.

Abilities.Name: Maestro
Abilities.Description: Doubles the speed of Sound-based moves.

WIGGLYTUFF.Pokedex: The surfaces of its saucerlike eyes are always covered with a thin layer of tears. If any dust gets in this Pokémon's eyes, it is quickly washed away.

ZUBAT.Name: Zubat

Abilities.Name: Inner Focus
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.

Abilities.Name: Infiltrator
Abilities.Description: Ignores screens and other barriers, Substitute, and boosted defensive stats.

ZUBAT.Pokedex: Their skin is so thin that they'll be burned if sunlight hits them. When it gets cold out, they gather together to warm one another's bodies.

GOLBAT.Name: Golbat

Abilities.Name: Inner Focus
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.

Abilities.Name: Infiltrator
Abilities.Description: Ignores screens and other barriers, Substitute, and boosted defensive stats.

GOLBAT.Pokedex: Its thick fangs are hollow like straws, making them unexpectedly fragile. These fangs are specialized for sucking blood.

ODDISH.Name: Oddish

Abilities.Name: Sickening
Abilities.Description: Special moves against it lower the attacker's Speed and Sp. Atk.

Abilities.Name: Adapted
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves of the same type by 33%.

ODDISH.Pokedex: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

GLOOM.Name: Gloom

Abilities.Name: Sickening
Abilities.Description: Special moves against it lower the attacker's Speed and Sp. Atk.

Abilities.Name: Adapted
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves of the same type by 33%.

GLOOM.Pokedex: A horribly noxious honey drools from its mouth. One whiff of the honey can result in memory loss. Some fans are said to enjoy this overwhelming stink, however.

VILEPLUME.Name: Vileplume

Abilities.Name: Sickening
Abilities.Description: Special moves against it lower the attacker's Speed and Sp. Atk.

Abilities.Name: Adapted
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves of the same type by 33%.

VILEPLUME.Pokedex: The bud bursts into bloom with a bang. It then starts scattering allergenic, poisonous pollen.

PARAS.Name: Paras

Abilities.Name: Infected
Abilities.Description: Also Grass in addition to its other types. When hit by a physical move, the attacker is also infected.

Abilities.Name: Bad Dreams
Abilities.Description: Reduces a sleeping foe's HP by 1/8 at the end of a round.

PARAS.Pokedex: No matter how much it eats, the mushrooms growing on its back steal away most of the nutrients it consumes.

PARASECT.Name: Parasect

Abilities.Name: Infected
Abilities.Description: Also Grass in addition to its other types. When hit by a physical move, the attacker is also infected.

Abilities.Name: Bad Dreams
Abilities.Description: Reduces a sleeping foe's HP by 1/8 at the end of a round.

PARASECT.Pokedex: The large mushroom on its back controls it. It often fights over territory with Shiinotic.

VENONAT.Name: Venonat

Abilities.Name: Fluffy
Abilities.Description: Doubles Defense. The Pokémon takes double damage from Fire-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Tinted Lens
Abilities.Description: Doubles the damage of "not very effective" moves.

VENONAT.Pokedex: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.

VENOMOTH.Name: Venomoth

Abilities.Name: Fluffy
Abilities.Description: Doubles Defense. The Pokémon takes double damage from Fire-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Tinted Lens
Abilities.Description: Doubles the damage of "not very effective" moves.

VENOMOTH.Pokedex: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove from skin. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.

DIGLETT.Name: Diglett

Abilities.Name: Earthshaker
Abilities.Description: In sandstorm, Attack is boosted by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Sapper
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, traps each opponent in a sand tomb for two turns.

DIGLETT.Pokedex: Around their crops, farmers plant trees that Diglett like to eat as a way of getting Diglett to plow the fields for them.

DUGTRIO.Name: Dugtrio

Abilities.Name: Earthshaker
Abilities.Description: In sandstorm, Attack is boosted by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Sapper
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, traps each opponent in a sand tomb for two turns.

DUGTRIO.Pokedex: Dugtrio's heads are sleek and smooth and incredibly hard. It can dig through any soil with its headbutts.

MEOWTH.Name: Meowth

Abilities.Name: Fortune
Abilities.Description: Doubles the money gained from battles in which it participates.

Abilities.Name: All That Glitters
Abilities.Description: Can hold two different items, if both are Gems.

MEOWTH.Pokedex: It loves coins, so if you give it one, you can make friends with Meowth easily. But it's fickle, so you can't count on that friendship lasting.

PERSIAN.Name: Persian

Abilities.Name: Fortune
Abilities.Description: Doubles the money gained from battles in which it participates.

Abilities.Name: All That Glitters
Abilities.Description: Can hold two different items, if both are Gems.

PERSIAN.Pokedex: Behind its lithe, elegant appearance lies a barbaric side. It will tear apart its prey on a mere whim.

PSYDUCK.Name: Psyduck

Abilities.Name: Headache
Abilities.Description: Doubles Sp. Atk, but the Pokemon becomes dizzy after attacking.

Abilities.Name: Stupefying
Abilities.Description: Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves. Dizzies opponents that it hits below half health.

PSYDUCK.Pokedex: If its chronic headache peaks, it may exhibit odd powers. It seems unable to recall such an episode.

GOLDUCK.Name: Golduck

Abilities.Name: Headache
Abilities.Description: Doubles Sp. Atk, but the Pokemon becomes dizzy after attacking.

Abilities.Name: Stupefying
Abilities.Description: Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves. Dizzies opponents that it hits below half health.

GOLDUCK.Pokedex: It appears by waterways at dusk. It may use telekinetic powers if its forehead glows mysteriously.

MANKEY.Name: Mankey

Abilities.Name: Defiant
Abilities.Description: Raises Attack by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

Abilities.Name: Dominating
Abilities.Description: After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Attack and Defense.

MANKEY.Pokedex: It can spontaneously become enraged. Everyone near it clears out as it rampages and the resulting loneliness makes it angrier still.

PRIMEAPE.Name: Primeape

Abilities.Name: Defiant
Abilities.Description: Raises Attack by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

Abilities.Name: Dominating
Abilities.Description: After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Attack and Defense.

PRIMEAPE.Pokedex: It has been known to become so angry that it dies as a result. Its face looks peaceful in death, however.

GROWLITHE.Name: Growlithe

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Heart of Justice
Abilities.Description: Immune to Dark-type moves, and boosts both attacking stats when hit by one.

GROWLITHE.Pokedex: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

ARCANINE.Name: Arcanine

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Heart of Justice
Abilities.Description: Immune to Dark-type moves, and boosts both attacking stats when hit by one.

ARCANINE.Pokedex: Legends tell of it fighting alongside a general and conquering a whole country. Those hearing its bark feel compelled to grovel before it.

POLIWAG.Name: Poliwag

Abilities.Name: Clear Body
Abilities.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

Abilities.Name: Rain Dish
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in rain.

POLIWAG.Pokedex: In rivers with fast-flowing water, this Pokémon will cling to a rock by using its thick lips, which act like a suction cup.

POLIWHIRL.Name: Poliwhirl

Abilities.Name: Clear Body
Abilities.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

Abilities.Name: Rain Dish
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in rain.

POLIWHIRL.Pokedex: This Pokémon's sweat is a slimy mucus. When captured, Poliwhirl can slither from its enemies' grasp and escape.

POLIWRATH.Name: Poliwrath

Abilities.Name: Counter Flow
Abilities.Description: When hit with a special move, hits back instantly with Breach.

Abilities.Name: Rain Dish
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in rain.

POLIWRATH.Pokedex: Its percentage of body fat is nearly zero. Its body is entirely muscle, which makes it heavy and forces its swimming prowess to develop.

ABRA.Name: Abra

Abilities.Name: Warping Effect
Abilities.Description: Double Sp. Def in eclipse.

Abilities.Name: Steelworker
Abilities.Description: Powers up Steel-type moves by 50%.

ABRA.Pokedex: It can read others' minds and will teleport away when danger approaches. You must clear your mind if you want to catch it.

KADABRA.Name: Kadabra

Abilities.Name: Warping Effect
Abilities.Description: Double Sp. Def in eclipse.

Abilities.Name: Steelworker
Abilities.Description: Powers up Steel-type moves by 50%.

KADABRA.Pokedex: It stares at a silver spoon to amplify its psychic powers before it lets loose. Apparently, gold spoons are no good.

ALAKAZAM.Name: Alakazam

Abilities.Name: Warping Effect
Abilities.Description: Double Sp. Def in eclipse.

Abilities.Name: Steelworker
Abilities.Description: Powers up Steel-type moves by 50%.

ALAKAZAM.Pokedex: Alakazam's brain continually grows, making its head far too heavy to support with its neck. This Pokémon holds its head up using its psychokinetic power instead.

MACHOP.Name: Machop

Abilities.Name: Feel the Burn
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 75%, but the Pokémon becomes burned after attacking.

Abilities.Name: No Guard
Abilities.Description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

MACHOKE.Name: Machoke

Abilities.Name: Feel the Burn
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 75%, but the Pokémon becomes burned after attacking.

Abilities.Name: No Guard
Abilities.Description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

MACHOKE.Pokedex: Machoke works out every day even as it helps with tough labor. On its days off, this Pokémon heads to the fields and mountains to exercise and train.

MACHAMP.Name: Machamp

Abilities.Name: Feel the Burn
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 75%, but the Pokémon becomes burned after attacking.

Abilities.Name: No Guard
Abilities.Description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

MACHAMP.Pokedex: It can lift heavy loads with the greatest of ease. It can even heft dump trucks. But its clumsy fingers prevent it from doing any precision work.

BELLSPROUT.Name: Bellsprout

Abilities.Name: Trapper
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage from Pokémon that are trapped.

Abilities.Name: Flytrap
Abilities.Description: Grants immunity to Bug-type moves, and raises both attacking stats when hit by one.

WEEPINBELL.Name: Weepinbell

Abilities.Name: Trapper
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage from Pokémon that are trapped.

Abilities.Name: Flytrap
Abilities.Description: Grants immunity to Bug-type moves, and raises both attacking stats when hit by one.

WEEPINBELL.Pokedex: If its prey is bigger than its mouth, it slices up the victim with sharp leaves, then eats every morsel.

VICTREEBEL.Name: Victreebel

Abilities.Name: Trapper
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage from Pokémon that are trapped.

Abilities.Name: Flytrap
Abilities.Description: Grants immunity to Bug-type moves, and raises both attacking stats when hit by one.

VICTREEBEL.Pokedex: It attracts prey with aromatic honey, then melts them in its mouth. Acid that has dissolved many prey becomes sweeter, making it even more alluring.

TENTACOOL.Name: Tentacool

Abilities.Name: Sap Sipper
Abilities.Description: Immune to Grass-type moves, and raises both attacking stats when hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Grip Strength
Abilities.Description: Moves that bind the opponent deal 50% more damage (on the initial hit).

TENTACOOL.Pokedex: Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey.

TENTACRUEL.Name: Tentacruel

Abilities.Name: Sap Sipper
Abilities.Description: Immune to Grass-type moves, and raises both attacking stats when hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Grip Strength
Abilities.Description: Moves that bind the opponent deal 50% more damage (on the initial hit).

TENTACRUEL.Pokedex: It communicates with others of its kind by lighting up the red orbs on its head. When the orbs are blinking, it's a warning sign.

GEODUDE.Name: Geodude

Abilities.Name: Unbreakable
Abilities.Description: Prevents half the self-damage from recoil and Self-Destruct/Explosion.

Abilities.Name: Desert Armor
Abilities.Description: Doubles Defense in a sandstorm.

GEODUDE.Pokedex: The longer it lives, the more its edges are chipped and worn away. However, this Pokémon's heart will remain hard, craggy, and rough always.

GRAVELER.Name: Graveler

Abilities.Name: Unbreakable
Abilities.Description: Prevents half the self-damage from recoil and Self-Destruct/Explosion.

Abilities.Name: Desert Armor
Abilities.Description: Doubles Defense in a sandstorm.

GRAVELER.Pokedex: This Pokémon will climb a mountain from the base to the summit, crunchingly feasting on rocks all the while. Upon reaching the peak, it rolls back down to the bottom.

GOLEM.Name: Golem

Abilities.Name: Unbreakable
Abilities.Description: Prevents half the self-damage from recoil and Self-Destruct/Explosion.

Abilities.Name: Desert Armor
Abilities.Description: Doubles Defense in a sandstorm.

GOLEM.Pokedex: When Golem grow old, they stop shedding their shells. Those that have lived a long, long time have shells green with moss.

PONYTA.Name: Ponyta

Abilities.Name: Sun Chaser
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 30% in sunshine.

Abilities.Name: Iron Heel
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of kicking moves by 30%.

PONYTA.Pokedex: About an hour after birth, its fiery mane and tail grow out, giving it an impressive appearance.

RAPIDASH.Name: Rapidash

Abilities.Name: Sun Chaser
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 30% in sunshine.

Abilities.Name: Iron Heel
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of kicking moves by 30%.

RAPIDASH.Pokedex: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

SLOWPOKE.Name: Slowpoke

Abilities.Name: Regenerator
Abilities.Description: Restores 25% of max HP when withdrawn from battle.

Abilities.Name: Mental Block
Abilities.Description: The Pokemon can't be Taunted, Encored, Tormented, Heal Blocked, Disabled, Barred, Dizzied, or Flinched.

SLOWPOKE.Pokedex: Slowpoke uses its tail to catch prey by dipping it in rivers. However, it often forgets what it's doing and spends entire days just loafing at water's edge.

SLOWBRO.Name: Slowbro

Abilities.Name: Delayed Reaction
Abilities.Description: 33% of all move damage taken is instead taken at the end of the next turn.

Abilities.Name: Placidity
Abilities.Description: Takes no damage from status ailments.

SLOWBRO.Pokedex: A metamorphosed Shellder has latched onto Slowbro's tail. The tail can't be used for fishing anymore, forcing Slowbro to grudgingly swim and catch prey instead.

MAGNEMITE.Name: Magnemite

Abilities.Name: Analytic
Abilities.Description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last by 30%.

Abilities.Name: No Guard
Abilities.Description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

MAGNEMITE.Pokedex: It's frequently the cause of power outages, which is why some power plants send out electrical signals that it can't stand.

MAGNETON.Name: Magneton

Abilities.Name: Analytic
Abilities.Description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last by 30%.

Abilities.Name: No Guard
Abilities.Description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

MAGNETON.Pokedex: When rain clouds form, many Magneton gather in high places to wait for lightning to strike.

FARFETCHD.Name: Farfetch'd

Abilities.Name: Perfect Luck
Abilities.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves. Always deals critical hits.

Abilities.Name: Fat Chance
Abilities.Description: Raises all of its stats whenever it knocks out a Pokémon with a critical hit.

FARFETCHD.Pokedex: The stalk this Pokémon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.

DODUO.Name: Doduo

Abilities.Name: Fluster Flock
Abilities.Description: Doubles Attack, but the Pokemon becomes dizzy after attacking.

Abilities.Name: Outrider
Abilities.Description: After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Attack and Speed.

DODUO.Pokedex: By alternately raising and lowering its two heads, it balances itself to be more stable while running.

DODRIO.Name: Dodrio

Abilities.Name: Fluster Flock
Abilities.Description: Doubles Attack, but the Pokemon becomes dizzy after attacking.

Abilities.Name: Outrider
Abilities.Description: After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Attack and Speed.

DODRIO.Pokedex: It collects data and plans three times as wisely, but it may think too much and fall into a state of immobility.

SEEL.Name: Seel

Abilities.Name: Bitter
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are critical against frostbitten targets.

Abilities.Name: Swift Swim
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

SEEL.Pokedex: Seel hunts in the frigid sea underneath sheets of ice. When it needs to breathe, it breaks through the ice with the sharply protruding section of its head.

DEWGONG.Name: Dewgong

Abilities.Name: Bitter
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are critical against frostbitten targets.

Abilities.Name: Swift Swim
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

DEWGONG.Pokedex: It sunbathes on the beach after meals. The rise in its body temperature helps its digestion.

GRIMER.Name: Grimer

Abilities.Name: Toxin Tax
Abilities.Description: Heals based on the damage other battlers take from being poisoned.

Abilities.Name: Toxic Attitude
Abilities.Description: Powers up Poison-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.

GRIMER.Pokedex: Its main source of food is the slimy industrial waste of factories. This Pokémon's numbers have been decreasing in recent years.

MUK.Name: Muk

Abilities.Name: Toxin Tax
Abilities.Description: Heals based on the damage other battlers take from being poisoned.

Abilities.Name: Toxic Attitude
Abilities.Description: Powers up Poison-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.

MUK.Pokedex: Their food sources have decreased, and their numbers have declined sharply. Sludge ponds are being built to prevent their extinction.

SHELLDER.Name: Shellder

Abilities.Name: Tough
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fighting- and Rock-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Skill Link
Abilities.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves.

SHELLDER.Pokedex: This Pokémon's tongue is always hanging out. It uses its tongue with great dexterity to dig up sand from the seabed in its search for food.

CLOYSTER.Name: Cloyster

Abilities.Name: Tough
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fighting- and Rock-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Skill Link
Abilities.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves.

CLOYSTER.Pokedex: Cloyster swims by swallowing water, then jetting it out toward the rear. It shoots spikes from its shell using the same system.

GASTLY.Name: Gastly

Abilities.Name: Levitate
Abilities.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Break Through
Abilities.Description: Moves ignore immunities due to typing.

GASTLY.Pokedex: When exposed to a strong wind, a Gastly's gaseous body quickly dwindles away. They cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.

HAUNTER.Name: Haunter

Abilities.Name: Levitate
Abilities.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Break Through
Abilities.Description: Moves ignore immunities due to typing.

HAUNTER.Pokedex: On moonless nights, Haunter searches for someone to curse, so it's best not to go out walking around.

GENGAR.Name: Gengar

Abilities.Name: Levitate
Abilities.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Break Through
Abilities.Description: Moves ignore immunities due to typing.

GENGAR.Pokedex: Should you feel yourself attacked by a sudden chill, it is evidence of an approaching Gengar. There is no escaping it. Give up.

ONIX.Name: Onix

Abilities.Name: Radiate
Abilities.Description: Increases Sp. Atk by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Gravitas
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, intensifies gravity for five turns.

ONIX.Pokedex: Onix has a magnet in its brain. It acts as a compass so that this Pokémon does not lose direction while it is tunneling.

DROWZEE.Name: Drowzee

Abilities.Name: Bad Dreams
Abilities.Description: Reduces a sleeping foe's HP by 1/8 at the end of a round.

Abilities.Name: Knuckleduster
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 50%.

DROWZEE.Pokedex: A Pokémon that nourishes itself by eating dreams, it is thought to share common ancestry with Munna and Musharna.

HYPNO.Name: Hypno

Abilities.Name: Bad Dreams
Abilities.Description: Reduces a sleeping foe's HP by 1/8 at the end of a round.

Abilities.Name: Knuckleduster
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 50%.

HYPNO.Pokedex: While it is an extremely dangerous Pokémon, people who are in need of a good, sound sleep call it their savior.

KRABBY.Name: Krabby

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Steely Shell
Abilities.Description: Steel-type attacks deal 50% more damage, and the Pokemon is protected from critical hits.

KRABBY.Pokedex: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.

KINGLER.Name: Kingler

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Steely Shell
Abilities.Description: Steel-type attacks deal 50% more damage, and the Pokemon is protected from critical hits.

KINGLER.Pokedex: Kingler has an enormous, oversized claw, which it waves in the air to communicate with others. However, because the claw is so heavy, it quickly tires.

VOLTORB.Name: Voltorb

Abilities.Name: Bunker Down
Abilities.Description: Self-destructing at full health leaves it at 1 HP.

Abilities.Name: Ball Lightning
Abilities.Description: Deals more damage to targets the faster it is than them. Up to a 50% bonus at double Speed.

VOLTORB.Pokedex: It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.

ELECTRODE.Name: Electrode

Abilities.Name: Bunker Down
Abilities.Description: Self-destructing at full health leaves it at 1 HP.

Abilities.Name: Ball Lightning
Abilities.Description: Deals more damage to targets the faster it is than them. Up to a 50% bonus at double Speed.

ELECTRODE.Pokedex: They appear in great numbers at electric power plants. Because they feed on electricity, they cause massive and chaotic blackouts in nearby cities.

EXEGGCUTE.Name: Exeggcute

Abilities.Name: Arcane
Abilities.Description: Increases Sp. Atk by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Chlorophyll
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

EXEGGCUTE.Pokedex: These Pokémon get nervous when they're not in a group of six. The minute even one member of the group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.

EXEGGUTOR.Name: Exeggutor

Abilities.Name: Arcane
Abilities.Description: Increases Sp. Atk by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Chlorophyll
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

EXEGGUTOR.Pokedex: Each of its three heads has its own thoughts. When they want to go in different directions, Exeggutor becomes unable to move.

CUBONE.Name: Cubone

Abilities.Name: Rock Head
Abilities.Description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

Abilities.Name: Break Through
Abilities.Description: Moves ignore immunities due to typing.

CUBONE.Pokedex: This Pokémon wears the skull of its deceased mother. Sometimes Cubone's dreams make it cry, but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.

MAROWAK.Name: Marowak

Abilities.Name: Rock Head
Abilities.Description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

Abilities.Name: Break Through
Abilities.Description: Moves ignore immunities due to typing.

MAROWAK.Pokedex: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.

HITMONLEE.Name: Hitmonlee

Abilities.Name: Iron Heel
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of kicking moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Kickback
Abilities.Description: Rather than take recoil damage, it swaps out, and its replacement takes that damage.

HITMONLEE.Pokedex: Its legs can stretch double. First-time foes are startled by its extensible reach.

HITMONCHAN.Name: Hitmonchan

Abilities.Name: Adrenaline Rush
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by four steps when its HP is lowered below half.

Abilities.Name: Shifting Fist
Abilities.Description: Punching moves change secondary type and their power is boosted by 30%.

HITMONCHAN.Pokedex: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

LICKITUNG.Name: Lickitung

Abilities.Name: Tenderize
Abilities.Description: At the end of each round, lowers other numbed Pokémons' Defense and Sp. Def by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Air Lock
Abilities.Description: Suppresses the effects of weather.

LICKITUNG.Pokedex: It licks filth clean with its tongue. Whatever it licks always stinks afterward, so whether it's really clean is... questionable.

KOFFING.Name: Koffing

Abilities.Name: Neutralizing Gas
Abilities.Description: Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

Abilities.Name: Fumigate
Abilities.Description: Random added effects of wind-based moves are +50% more likely likely to occur.

KOFFING.Pokedex: Getting up close to a Koffing will give you a chance to observe, through its thin skin, the toxic gasses swirling inside. It blows up at the slightest stimulation.

WEEZING.Name: Weezing

Abilities.Name: Neutralizing Gas
Abilities.Description: Abilities will be nullified or will not be triggered.

Abilities.Name: Fumigate
Abilities.Description: Random added effects of wind-based moves are +50% more likely likely to occur.

WEEZING.Pokedex: Top-grade perfume is made using its internal poison gasses by diluting them to the highest level.

RHYHORN.Name: Rhyhorn

Abilities.Name: Reckless
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Fortified
Abilities.Description: Take 30% less damage from attacks on turns when it hasn't moved yet.

RHYHORN.Pokedex: It is so dense, while on a run it forgets why it started running in the first place. It apparently remembers sometimes if it demolishes something.

RHYDON.Name: Rhydon

Abilities.Name: Reckless
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Fortified
Abilities.Description: Take 30% less damage from attacks on turns when it hasn't moved yet.

RHYDON.Pokedex: Rhydon has a horn that serves as a drill. This Pokémon occasionally rams into streams of magma, but the armor-like hide prevents it from feeling the heat.

CHANSEY.Name: Chansey

Abilities.Name: Serene Grace
Abilities.Description: Doubles the likelihood of the user's random added effects activating.

Abilities.Name: Bliss
Abilities.Description: Increase the EXP gained from battles in which it participates by 50%.

CHANSEY.Pokedex: It walks carefully to prevent its egg from breaking. However, it is extremely fast at running away.

TANGELA.Name: Tangela

Abilities.Name: Late Bloomer
Abilities.Description: Deals 30% more damage when it's slower than the target.

Abilities.Name: Tangling Hair
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed by three steps.

TANGELA.Pokedex: Its vines snap off easily and painlessly if they are grabbed, allowing it to make a quick getaway. The lost vines are replaced by new growth the very next day.

KANGASKHAN.Name: Kangaskhan

Abilities.Name: Inner Focus
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.

KANGASKHAN.Pokedex: Although it's carrying its baby in a pouch on its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.

HORSEA.Name: Horsea

Abilities.Name: Serene Grace
Abilities.Description: Doubles the likelihood of the user's random added effects activating.

Abilities.Name: Gyre Spinner
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, traps each opponent in a whirlpool for two turns.

HORSEA.Pokedex: They swim with dance-like motions and cause whirlpools to form. Horsea compete to see which of them can generate the biggest whirlpool.

SEADRA.Name: Seadra

Abilities.Name: Serene Grace
Abilities.Description: Doubles the likelihood of the user's random added effects activating.

Abilities.Name: Gyre Spinner
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, traps each opponent in a whirlpool for two turns.

SEADRA.Pokedex: It's the males that raise the offspring. While Seadra are raising young, the spines on their backs secrete thicker and stronger poison.

GOLDEEN.Name: Goldeen

Abilities.Name: Dancer
Abilities.Description: Repeats another Pokémon's dance move immediately.

Abilities.Name: Volt Absorb
Abilities.Description: Immune to Electric-type moves and restores HP when hit by one.

GOLDEEN.Pokedex: Although known for their splendid tail fins, Goldeen apparently compete among themselves to see whose horn is thickest and sharpest.

SEAKING.Name: Seaking

Abilities.Name: Dancer
Abilities.Description: Repeats another Pokémon's dance move immediately.

Abilities.Name: Volt Absorb
Abilities.Description: Immune to Electric-type moves and restores HP when hit by one.

SEAKING.Pokedex: Trainers who are crazy for Seaking are divided into horn enthusiasts and fin enthusiasts. The two groups do not get along well.

STARYU.Name: Staryu

Abilities.Name: Stars Align
Abilities.Description: During eclipse, can't miss and always activates its moves random added effects.

Abilities.Name: Energetic
Abilities.Description: Can't be numbed, poisoned, or have its Speed reduced.

STARYU.Pokedex: This Pokémon gets nibbled on by Lumineon and others. Thanks to its red core, it regenerates fast, so it's unconcerned by their snack attacks.

STARMIE.Name: Starmie

Abilities.Name: Stars Align
Abilities.Description: During eclipse, can't miss and always activates its moves random added effects.

Abilities.Name: Energetic
Abilities.Description: Can't be numbed, poisoned, or have its Speed reduced.

STARMIE.Pokedex: This Pokémon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.

MRMIME.Name: Mr. Mime

Abilities.Name: Barrier Maker
Abilities.Description: Sets a Reflect for 4 turns upon entering the battle.

Abilities.Name: Decontamination
Abilities.Description: Prevents Bug- or Poison-type moves during moonglow.

MRMIME.Pokedex: Emanations from its fingertips solidify the air into invisible walls that repel even harsh attacks.

SCYTHER.Name: Scyther

Abilities.Name: Technician
Abilities.Description: Moves with base power 60 or less deal 50% more damage.

Abilities.Name: Inner Focus
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.

SCYTHER.Pokedex: While young, they live together deep in the mountains, training themselves in how to fight with their scythes and move at high speeds.

JYNX.Name: Jynx

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Ice Queen
Abilities.Description: During hail, it restores its HP by half the damage it deals with attacks.

JYNX.Pokedex: Its cries sound like human speech. However, it is impossible to tell what it is trying to say.

ELECTABUZZ.Name: Electabuzz

Abilities.Name: Shock Style
Abilities.Description: Powers up Fighting-type moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Adrenaline Rush
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by four steps when its HP is lowered below half.

ELECTABUZZ.Pokedex: While it's often blamed for power outages, the truth is the cause of outages is more often an error on the part of the electric company.

MAGMAR.Name: Magmar

Abilities.Name: Mega Launcher
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of pulse moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Scalding Smoke
Abilities.Description: Powers up Poison-type moves by 50%.

MAGMAR.Pokedex: When it breathes deeply, heat mirages form around its body, making it hard to see clearly.

PINSIR.Name: Pinsir

Abilities.Name: Victory Molt
Abilities.Description: Heals status conditions and resets stat changes after knocking out any Pokémon.

Abilities.Name: Juggernaut
Abilities.Description: Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves or activate after hitting the target.

PINSIR.Pokedex: Although it's tough, it can't handle cold well. When night falls, it buries itself in leafage and sleeps.

TAUROS.Name: Tauros

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Stampede
Abilities.Description: The user's critical hit chance raises or lowers with its Speed.

TAUROS.Pokedex: When Tauros begins whipping itself with its tails, it's a warning that the Pokémon is about to charge with astounding speed.

MAGIKARP.Name: Magikarp

Abilities.Name: Multiscale
Abilities.Description: Reduces move damage taken by 50% when HP is full.

MAGIKARP.Pokedex: Its swimming muscles are weak, so it is easily washed away by currents. In places where water pools, you can see many Magikarp deposited there by the flow.

GYARADOS.Name: Gyarados

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: City Razer
Abilities.Description: After knocking out any Pokémon with Waterfall, transforms into its Rampage form. Ability becomes Mold Breaker.

GYARADOS.Pokedex: Brutally vicious and enormously destructive. Known for totally destroying cities in ancient times.

LAPRAS.Name: Lapras

Abilities.Name: Arctic Ariette
Abilities.Description: Sound-based attacks turn Ice-type and are boosted by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Leviathan
Abilities.Description: Protected from critical hits. Can't be burned or frostbitten.

LAPRAS.Pokedex: Once endangered, they are now overabundant. Their mournful songs have died out as the population rebounds.

DITTO.Name: Ditto

Abilities.Name: Imposter
Abilities.Description: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.

DITTO.Pokedex: With its astonishing capacity for metamorphosis, it can get along with anything - except for its fellow Ditto.

EEVEE.Name: Eevee

Abilities.Name: Adapted
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves of the same type by 33%.

EEVEE.Pokedex: Eevee has an unstable genetic makeup that suddenly mutates due to the environment in which it lives.

VAPOREON.Name: Vaporeon

Abilities.Name: Hydration
Abilities.Description: Heals status problems each turn if it is raining.

Abilities.Name: Breaking Wave
Abilities.Description: Slips past hazards. On the first turn, its attacks are always critical.

VAPOREON.Pokedex: When Vaporeon's fins begin to vibrate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours.

JOLTEON.Name: Jolteon

Abilities.Name: Overwhelm
Abilities.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in rain.

Abilities.Name: Needle Fur
Abilities.Description: Attackers lose 1/10th of their HP. If the Pokémon is below half health, attackers lose 1/5th instead.

JOLTEON.Pokedex: Its lungs contain an organ that creates electricity. The crackling sound of electricity can be heard when it exhales.

FLAREON.Name: Flareon

Abilities.Name: Heat Veil
Abilities.Description: Doubled Sp. Def in sunshine.

Abilities.Name: Ignition Cycle
Abilities.Description: Each turn, raises Speed by three steps and loses HP. If Speed was maxed, instead Speed and HP are reset.

FLAREON.Pokedex: A dedicated omnivore, Flareon will eat anything - as long as it's been slow-roasted first.

PORYGON.Name: Porygon

Abilities.Name: Realist
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dragon- and Fairy-type attacks.

Abilities.Name: Shaky Code
Abilities.Description: During eclipse, changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's using.

PORYGON.Pokedex: This Pokémon was created using the cutting-edge science of 20 years ago, so many parts of it have since become obsolete.

OMANYTE.Name: Omanyte

Abilities.Name: Swift Swim
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

Abilities.Name: Introvert
Abilities.Description: Takes 30% less damage until it uses an attack.

OMANYTE.Pokedex: Because some Omanyte manage to escape after being restored or are released into the wild by people, this species is becoming a problem.

OMASTAR.Name: Omastar

Abilities.Name: Swift Swim
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in rain.

Abilities.Name: Introvert
Abilities.Description: Takes 30% less damage until it uses an attack.

OMASTAR.Pokedex: Its heavy shell is thought to be the reason this ancient Pokémon died out. It's apparently a distant ancestor of Octillery.

KABUTO.Name: Kabuto

Abilities.Name: Super Luck
Abilities.Description: Four times more likely for moves to be critical.

Abilities.Name: Unafraid
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dark- and Bug-type moves.

KABUTO.Pokedex: This species is almost entirely extinct. Kabuto molt every three days, making their shells harder and harder.

KABUTOPS.Name: Kabutops

Abilities.Name: Super Luck
Abilities.Description: Four times more likely for moves to be critical.

Abilities.Name: Unafraid
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dark- and Bug-type moves.

KABUTOPS.Pokedex: Kabutops slices its prey apart and sucks out the fluids. The discarded body parts become food for other Pokémon.

AERODACTYL.Name: Aerodactyl

Abilities.Name: Armor Piercing
Abilities.Description: Deals double damage against Pokémon that have raised defenses or that are protected by a screen.

Abilities.Name: Scoured Silhouette
Abilities.Description: Upon entry during sandstorm, lowers foe's Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps each.

AERODACTYL.Pokedex: It flew through the open skies over the ancient continent as if they were its own. When it touched ground, its walk was weak and slow.

SNORLAX.Name: Snorlax

Abilities.Name: Loud Sleeper
Abilities.Description: When hit while asleep, hits back instantly with Snore.

Abilities.Name: Thick Fat
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

SNORLAX.Pokedex: Its stomach is said to be incomparably strong. Even Muk's poison is nothing more than a hint of spice on Snorlax's tongue.

ARTICUNO.Name: Articuno

Abilities.Name: Frost Wings
Abilities.Description: Flying-type attacks have a 40% chance to frostbite.

ARTICUNO.Pokedex: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

ZAPDOS.Name: Zapdos

Abilities.Name: Shock Wings
Abilities.Description: Flying-type attacks have a 40% chance to numb.

ZAPDOS.Pokedex: This legendary bird Pokémon is said to appear only when a thundercloud parts into two halves.

MOLTRES.Name: Moltres

Abilities.Name: Flame Wings
Abilities.Description: Flying-type attacks have a 40% chance to burn.

MOLTRES.Pokedex: One of the legendary bird Pokémon. It is said that its appearance indicates the coming of spring.

DRATINI.Name: Dratini

Abilities.Name: Shed Skin
Abilities.Description: Heals from burn, frostbite, poison, numb, or leech at end of turn.

Abilities.Name: Multiscale
Abilities.Description: Reduces move damage taken by 50% when HP is full.

DRATINI.Pokedex: Dratini continually molts and sloughs off its old skin. It does so because the life energy within its body steadily builds to reach uncontrollable levels.

DRAGONAIR.Name: Dragonair

Abilities.Name: Shed Skin
Abilities.Description: Heals from burn, frostbite, poison, numb, or leech at end of turn.

Abilities.Name: Multiscale
Abilities.Description: Reduces move damage taken by 50% when HP is full.

DRAGONAIR.Pokedex: Dragonair stores an enormous amount of energy inside its body. It is said to alter weather conditions in its vicinity via crystals on its neck and tail.

DRAGONITE.Name: Dragonite

Abilities.Name: Inner Focus
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.

Abilities.Name: Multiscale
Abilities.Description: Reduces move damage taken by 50% when HP is full.

DRAGONITE.Pokedex: It is said to make its home somewhere in the sea. It guides crews of shipwrecks to shore.

MEWTWO.Name: Mewtwo

Abilities.Name: Mental Block
Abilities.Description: The Pokemon can't be Taunted, Encored, Tormented, Heal Blocked, Disabled, Barred, Dizzied, or Flinched.

Abilities.Name: Motor Drive
Abilities.Description: Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Speed when hit by one.

LAIRON.Pokedex: During territorial disputes, Lairon fight by slamming into each other. Close inspection of their steel armor reveals scratches and dents.

AGGRON.Name: Aggron

Abilities.Name: Rock Head

Abilities.Name: Motor Drive
Abilities.Description: Grants immunity to Electric-type moves and boosts Speed when hit by one.

AGGRON.Pokedex: Long ago, there was a king who wore a helmet meant to resemble the head of an Aggron. He was trying to channel the Pokémon's strength.

Abilities.Name: Middle Way
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 50% if it used a special move last turn, or boosts Sp. Atk if physical.

Abilities.Name: Stability
Abilities.Description: Can't be poisoned, burned, or frostbitten.

MEDICHAM.Pokedex: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe's next move.

ELECTRIKE.Name: Electrike

MANECTRIC.Name: Manectric

Abilities.Name: Nerve Number
Abilities.Description: Special moves have a 30% chance to numb targets.

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

MANECTRIC.Pokedex: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.

ILLUMISE.Name: Illumise

SWALOT.Name: Swalot

Abilities.Name: Thick Fat
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Corrosion
Abilities.Description: Can poison the target even if it's a Steel or Poison type.

SWALOT.Pokedex: It gulps anything that fits in its mouth. Its special enzymes can dissolve anything.

CARVANHA.Name: Carvanha

Abilities.Name: Schadenfreude
Abilities.Description: Restores 1/4th health after any foe faints.

CARVANHA.Pokedex: It lives in massive rivers that course through jungles. It swarms prey that enter its territory.

SHARPEDO.Name: Sharpedo

Abilities.Name: Schadenfreude
Abilities.Description: Restores 1/4th health after any foe faints.

Abilities.Name: Marine Menace
Abilities.Description: Dive and Depth Charge deal 50% more damage.

SHARPEDO.Pokedex: It can swim at speeds of 75 mph by jetting seawater through its body. It is the bandit of the sea.

WAILMER.Name: Wailmer

Abilities.Description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

Abilities.Name: Gargantuan

WAILORD.Name: Wailord

Abilities.Name: Pressure
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

Abilities.Name: Gargantuan
Abilities.Description: Completely protects allies from foes' multi-target moves.

WAILORD.Pokedex: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.

NUMEL.Name: Numel

Abilities.Name: Unfazed

Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by four steps when its HP is lowered below half.

CAMERUPT.Name: Camerupt

Abilities.Name: Unfazed
Abilities.Description: Takes 20% less damage from neutrally effective attacks.

Abilities.Name: Adrenaline Rush
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by four steps when its HP is lowered below half.

TORKOAL.Name: Torkoal

SPOINK.Name: Spoink

Abilities.Name: Thick Fat
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

SPOINK.Pokedex: It bounces around on its tail to keep its heart pumping. It carries a pearl from Clamperl on its head.

GRUMPIG.Name: Grumpig

Abilities.Name: Thick Fat
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Pearl Seeker
Abilities.Description: Upon entry during eclipse, if it has no item, finds and equips the Pearl of Fate.

GRUMPIG.Pokedex: It uses black pearls to amplify its psychic power. It does an odd dance to gain control over foes.

SPINDA.Name: Spinda

TRAPINCH.Name: Trapinch

Abilities.Name: Desert Spirit

CACTURNE.Name: Cacturne

Abilities.Name: Heartless
Abilities.Description: Immune to Fairy-type moves and restores HP if hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Schadenfreude
Abilities.Description: Restores 1/4th health after any foe faints.

SWABLU.Name: Swablu

Abilities.Name: Mental Block

Abilities.Description: Ground-type moves deal 50% more damage in eclipse.

Abilities.Name: Filter

Abilities.Name: Impervious
Abilities.Description: Protects from critical hits and from enemies lowering Defense or Sp. Def.

Abilities.Name: Planar Veil

Abilities.Description: Reflects enemy status moves that target the Pokémon or create hazards around it.

CLAYDOL.Pokedex: It is said that it originates from clay dolls made by an ancient civilization.

LILEEP.Name: Lileep

CRADILY.Name: Cradily

Abilities.Name: Water Absorb

MILOTIC.Name: Milotic

CASTFORM.Name: Castform

BANETTE.Name: Banette

Abilities.Name: Malice

DUSKULL.Name: Duskull

DUSCLOPS.Name: Dusclops

Abilities.Name: Aggravate

Abilities.Name: Snow Shroud

SNORUNT.Name: Snorunt

GLALIE.Name: Glalie

SPHEAL.Name: Spheal

Abilities.Name: Full Blubber

Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn in a hailstorm.

SEALEO.Name: Sealeo

Abilities.Name: Full Blubber
Abilities.Description: Immune to Fire-type and Ice-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Ice Body
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn in a hailstorm.

SEALEO.Pokedex: This Pokémon has a habit of spinning round things on its nose, whether those things are Poké Balls or Spheal.

WALREIN.Name: Walrein

Abilities.Name: Full Blubber
Abilities.Description: Immune to Fire-type and Ice-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Ice Body
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn in a hailstorm.

WALREIN.Pokedex: Walrein's tusks keep growing throughout its life. Tusks broken in battle will grow back to their usual impressive size in a year.

CLAMPERL.Name: Clamperl

Abilities.Name: Impervious

Abilities.Name: Illuminance
Abilities.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in moonglow.

CLAMPERL.Pokedex: It is protected by a sturdy shell. Once in a lifetime, it makes a magnificent pearl.

HUNTAIL.Name: Huntail

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Illuminance
Abilities.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in moonglow.

HUNTAIL.Pokedex: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.

GOREBYSS.Name: Gorebyss

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Illuminance
Abilities.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in moonglow.

GOREBYSS.Pokedex: Its swimming form is exquisitely elegant. With its thin mouth, it feeds on seaweed that grows between rocks.

RELICANTH.Name: Relicanth

LUVDISC.Name: Luvdisc

BAGON.Name: Bagon

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

BAGON.Pokedex: Bagon is a solitary Pokémon that doesn't form groups with others of its kind. It also has a head hard enough to cleave a boulder in one strike.

SHELGON.Name: Shelgon

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Scathing Syzygy
Abilities.Description: Boosts all of the Pokémon's move damage by 25% during eclipse.

SHELGON.Pokedex: Shelgon ignores its hunger entirely, never eating any food. Apparently, Shelgon will evolve once all its energy stores are used up.

SALAMENCE.Name: Salamence

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Scathing Syzygy
Abilities.Description: Boosts all of the Pokémon's move damage by 25% during eclipse.

SALAMENCE.Pokedex: While basking in the joy of flight generally keeps this Pokémon in high spirits, Salamence turns into an uncontrollable menace if something angers it.

BELDUM.Name: Beldum

Abilities.Description: Its attacks are always physical attacks.

Abilities.Name: Optimized Alloy

BELDUM.Pokedex: From its rear, Beldum emits a magnetic force that rapidly pulls opponents in. They get skewered on Beldum's sharp claws.

METANG.Name: Metang

Abilities.Name: Brute Force
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are always physical attacks.

Abilities.Name: Optimized Alloy
Abilities.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps, and its weight is doubled.

METANG.Pokedex: Using magnetic forces to stay aloft, this Pokémon flies at high speeds, weaving through harsh mountain terrain in pursuit of prey.

METAGROSS.Name: Metagross

Abilities.Name: Brute Force
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are always physical attacks.

Abilities.Name: Optimized Alloy
Abilities.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps, and its weight is doubled.

METAGROSS.Pokedex: Metagross is the result of the fusion of two Metang. This Pokémon defeats its opponents through use of its supercomputer-level brain.

LATIAS.Name: Latias

Abilities.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

LATIOS.Name: Latios

Abilities.Name: Levitate
Abilities.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

LATIOS.Pokedex: Latios has the ability to make others see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This Pokémon is intelligent and understands human speech.

KYOGRE.Name: Kyogre

Abilities.Name: Drizzle
Abilities.Description: Summons rain for 4 turns when it enters battle.

KYOGRE.Pokedex: Kyogre is said to be the personification of the sea itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Groudon, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

GROUDON.Name: Groudon

Abilities.Name: Drought
Abilities.Description: Turns the weather to sunshine for 4 turns when it enters battle.

GROUDON.Pokedex: Groudon is said to be the personification of the land itself. Legends tell of its many clashes against Kyogre, as each sought to gain the power of nature.

RAYQUAZA.Name: Rayquaza

Abilities.Name: Air Lock
Abilities.Description: Suppresses the effects of weather.

RAYQUAZA.Pokedex: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. Legends remain of how it put to rest the clash between Kyogre and Groudon.

JIRACHI.Name: Jirachi

Abilities.Name: Wish Maker
Abilities.Description: The random added effects of its own moves, and of moves against it, always activate.

JIRACHI.Pokedex: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.

DEOXYS.Name: Deoxys

Abilities.Name: Unidentified
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon is Mutant-type.

DEOXYS.Pokedex: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.

TURTWIG.Name: Turtwig

Abilities.Name: Refuge
Abilities.Description: Pokémon that swap in for this have their status effects healed.

Abilities.Name: Living Armor
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/12th HP every turn. Protected against critical hits.

TURTWIG.Pokedex: It relies heavily on water to keep its plant healthy, and thus it spends most of its time near lakes. When thirsty, the plant on its head wilts.

GROTLE.Name: Grotle

Abilities.Name: Refuge
Abilities.Description: Pokémon that swap in for this have their status effects healed.

Abilities.Name: Living Armor
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/12th HP every turn. Protected against critical hits.

GROTLE.Pokedex: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.

TORTERRA.Name: Torterra

Abilities.Name: Refuge
Abilities.Description: Pokémon that swap in for this have their status effects healed.

Abilities.Name: Living Armor
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/12th HP every turn. Protected against critical hits.

TORTERRA.Pokedex: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.

CHIMCHAR.Name: Chimchar

Abilities.Name: Mystic Fist
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 30%, and makes them special when that would be more effective.

Abilities.Name: Heaven's Crown
Abilities.Description: If the Pokémon witnesses a Total Eclipse, it gets to move twice that turn.

CHIMCHAR.Pokedex: The gas made in its belly burns from its rear end. The fire burns weakly when it feels sick.

MONFERNO.Name: Monferno

Abilities.Name: Mystic Fist
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 30%, and makes them special when that would be more effective.

Abilities.Name: Heaven's Crown
Abilities.Description: If the Pokémon witnesses a Total Eclipse, it gets to move twice that turn.

MONFERNO.Pokedex: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.

INFERNAPE.Name: Infernape

Abilities.Name: Mystic Fist
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 30%, and makes them special when that would be more effective.

Abilities.Name: Heaven's Crown
Abilities.Description: If the Pokémon witnesses a Total Eclipse, it gets to move twice that turn.

INFERNAPE.Pokedex: It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all its limbs to fight in its own unique style.

PIPLUP.Name: Piplup

Abilities.Name: Imperious
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

Abilities.Name: Self-Sufficient
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/12th HP every turn. Protected from being burned or frostbitten.

PIPLUP.Pokedex: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

PRINPLUP.Name: Prinplup

Abilities.Name: Imperious
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

Abilities.Name: Self-Sufficient
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/12th HP every turn. Protected from being burned or frostbitten.

PRINPLUP.Pokedex: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.

EMPOLEON.Name: Empoleon

Abilities.Name: Imperious
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

Abilities.Name: Self-Sufficient
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/12th HP every turn. Protected from being burned or frostbitten.

EMPOLEON.Pokedex: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

STARLY.Name: Starly

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Reckless
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage by 30%.

STARLY.Pokedex: They flock around mountains and fields, chasing after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and annoying.

STARAVIA.Name: Staravia

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Reckless
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage by 30%.

STARAVIA.Pokedex: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.

STARAPTOR.Name: Staraptor

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Reckless
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage by 30%.

STARAPTOR.Pokedex: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

BIDOOF.Name: Bidoof

Abilities.Name: Simple
Abilities.Description: Stat changes in the Pokemon are doubled.

Abilities.Name: Moody
Abilities.Description: Raises one attacking or defending stat by three steps and lowers another by 1 at the end of each turn.

BIDOOF.Pokedex: It constantly gnaws on logs and rocks to whittle down its front teeth. It nests alongside water.

BIBAREL.Name: Bibarel

Abilities.Name: Simple
Abilities.Description: Stat changes in the Pokemon are doubled.

Abilities.Name: Moody
Abilities.Description: Raises one attacking or defending stat by three steps and lowers another by 1 at the end of each turn.

BIBAREL.Pokedex: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

KRICKETOT.Name: Kricketot

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Maestro
Abilities.Description: Doubles the speed of Sound-based moves.

KRICKETOT.Pokedex: When its antennae hit each other, it sounds like the music of a xylophone.

KRICKETUNE.Name: Kricketune

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Maestro
Abilities.Description: Doubles the speed of Sound-based moves.

KRICKETUNE.Pokedex: It signals its emotions with its melodies. Scientists are studying these melodic patterns.

SHINX.Name: Shinx

Abilities.Name: Night Vision
Abilities.Description: During moonglow, Speed is boosted by 50% and twice as likely to crit.

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

SHINX.Pokedex: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.

LUXIO.Name: Luxio

Abilities.Name: Night Vision
Abilities.Description: During moonglow, Speed is boosted by 50% and twice as likely to crit.

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

LUXIO.Pokedex: Strong electricity courses through the tips of its sharp claws. A light scratch causes fainting in foes.

LUXRAY.Name: Luxray

Abilities.Name: Night Vision
Abilities.Description: During moonglow, Speed is boosted by 50% and twice as likely to crit.

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

LUXRAY.Pokedex: Luxray's ability to see through objects comes in handy when it's scouting for danger.

BUDEW.Name: Budew

Abilities.Name: Natural Cure
Abilities.Description: All status problems heal when it switches out.

Abilities.Name: Merciless
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are critical against poisoned targets.

BUDEW.Pokedex: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

ROSERADE.Name: Roserade

Abilities.Name: Swordplay
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of blade moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Merciless
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are critical against poisoned targets.

ROSERADE.Pokedex: With the movements of a dancer, it strikes with whips that are densely lined with poison thorns.

CRANIDOS.Name: Cranidos

Abilities.Name: Sand Rush
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

Abilities.Name: Sturdy
Abilities.Description: It can't be knocked out with one hit.

CRANIDOS.Pokedex: A lifelong jungle dweller from 100 million years ago, it would snap obstructing trees with headbutts.

RAMPARDOS.Name: Rampardos

Abilities.Name: Sand Rush
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.

Abilities.Name: Sturdy
Abilities.Description: It can't be knocked out with one hit.

RAMPARDOS.Pokedex: Its skull is as hard as iron. It is a brute that tears down jungle trees while catching prey.

SHIELDON.Name: Shieldon

Abilities.Name: Rock Body
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn during sandstorm.

Abilities.Name: Battle-Hardened
Abilities.Description: Raises Def and Sp. Def by three steps each when its HP is lowered below half.

SHIELDON.Pokedex: It was generated from a fossil dug out of a layer of clay that was older than anyone knows. It has a sturdy face.

BASTIODON.Name: Bastiodon

Abilities.Name: Rock Body
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn during sandstorm.

Abilities.Name: Battle-Hardened
Abilities.Description: Raises Def and Sp. Def by three steps each when its HP is lowered below half.

BASTIODON.Pokedex: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.

BURMY.Name: Burmy

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Cloaking
Abilities.Description: It changes form to match the move it selected.

BURMY.Pokedex: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.

WORMADAM.Name: Wormadam

Abilities.Name: Impervious
Abilities.Description: Protects from critical hits and from enemies lowering Defense or Sp. Def.

Abilities.Name: Cloaking
Abilities.Description: It changes form to match the move it selected.

WORMADAM.Pokedex: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon's body. The cloak is never shed.

MOTHIM.Name: Mothim

Abilities.Name: Spare Scales
Abilities.Description: Raises defenses after using a Grass-, Ground-, or Steel-type move.

Abilities.Name: Moth Burglar
Abilities.Description: Hits opponent with Thief when withdrawn from battle.

MOTHIM.Pokedex: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.

COMBEE.Name: Combee

Abilities.Name: Royal Majesty
Abilities.Description: Makes foes unable to use priority attacks.

Abilities.Name: Stressful
Abilities.Description: Makes foes stressed and unable to use their items.

COMBEE.Pokedex: It collects honey for its colony. At night, they cluster to form a beehive and sleep. If a colony loses their Vespiquen, a new Combee will take its place.

VESPIQUEN.Name: Vespiquen

Abilities.Name: Royal Majesty
Abilities.Description: Makes foes unable to use priority attacks.

Abilities.Name: Stressful
Abilities.Description: Makes foes stressed and unable to use their items.

VESPIQUEN.Pokedex: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by Combee.

PACHIRISU.Name: Pachirisu

Abilities.Name: Bad Luck
Abilities.Description: When free from status, non-damaging moves by foes are drawn in.

Abilities.Name: Huggable
