PACHIRISU.Pokedex: A pair may be seen rubbing their cheek pouches together in an effort to share stored electricity.

BUIZEL.Name: Buizel

Abilities.Name: Moxie
Abilities.Description: Raises Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

Abilities.Name: Technician
Abilities.Description: Moves with base power 60 or less deal 50% more damage.

BUIZEL.Pokedex: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see what is going on.

FLOATZEL.Name: Floatzel

Abilities.Name: Moxie
Abilities.Description: Raises Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

Abilities.Name: Technician
Abilities.Description: Moves with base power 60 or less deal 50% more damage.

FLOATZEL.Pokedex: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.

CHERUBI.Name: Cherubi

Abilities.Name: Chlorophyll
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.

Abilities.Name: Introvert
Abilities.Description: Takes 30% less damage until it uses an attack.

CHERUBI.Pokedex: It evolves by sucking the energy out of the small ball where it had been storing nutrients.

CHERRIM.Name: Cherrim

Abilities.Name: Flower Gift
Abilities.Description: In sunshine boosts its and allies' Attack and Sp. Def by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Introvert
Abilities.Description: Takes 30% less damage until it uses an attack.

CHERRIM.Pokedex: If it senses strong sunlight, it opens its folded petals to absorb the sun's rays with its whole body.

SHELLOS.Name: Shellos

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Water Absorb
Abilities.Description: Immune to Water-type moves and restores HP when hit by one.

SHELLOS.Pokedex: The colors of this pokemon change depending on its environment. When it senses danger, this pokemon excretes a sticky purple liquid.

GASTRODON.Name: Gastrodon

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Water Absorb
Abilities.Description: Immune to Water-type moves and restores HP when hit by one.

GASTRODON.Pokedex: It apparently had a huge shell for protection in ancient times. It lives in shallow tidal pools.

AMBIPOM.Name: Ambipom

Abilities.Name: Sticky Fingers
Abilities.Description: Can hold a second item by stealing it.

Abilities.Name: Skill Link
Abilities.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves.

AMBIPOM.Pokedex: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.

DRIFLOON.Name: Drifloon

Abilities.Name: Unburden
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed if a held item is consumed in battle.

Abilities.Name: Drifting Mist
Abilities.Description: Creates Grey Mist for three turns when entering the battlefield.

DRIFLOON.Pokedex: These Pokémon are called the "Signpost for Wandering Spirits." Children holding them sometimes vanish.

DRIFBLIM.Name: Drifblim

Abilities.Name: Unburden
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed if a held item is consumed in battle.

Abilities.Name: Drifting Mist
Abilities.Description: Creates Grey Mist for three turns when entering the battlefield.

DRIFBLIM.Pokedex: It's drowsy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.

BUNEARY.Name: Buneary

Abilities.Name: Unafraid
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dark- and Bug-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Stubborn
Abilities.Description: Prevents its stats from being lowered by more than 1 step at a time.

BUNEARY.Pokedex: When it senses danger, it perks up its ears. On cold nights, it sleeps with its head tucked into its fur.

LOPUNNY.Name: Lopunny

Abilities.Name: Unafraid
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dark- and Bug-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Stubborn
Abilities.Description: Prevents its stats from being lowered by more than 1 step at a time.

LOPUNNY.Pokedex: The ears appear to be delicate. If they are touched roughly, it kicks with its graceful legs.

MISMAGIUS.Name: Mismagius

Abilities.Name: Ear-Splitting
Abilities.Description: Boosts power of sound-based moves by 50%.

MISMAGIUS.Pokedex: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.

HONCHKROW.Name: Honchkrow

HONCHKROW.Pokedex: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous Murkrow in tow.

GLAMEOW.Name: Glameow

Abilities.Description: Raises Sp. Atk by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

PURUGLY.Name: Purugly

Abilities.Name: Extorter

Abilities.Name: Competitive
Abilities.Description: Raises Sp. Atk by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

PURUGLY.Pokedex: To make itself appear intimidatingly beefy, it tightly cinches its waist with its twin tails.

CHINGLING.Name: Chingling

Abilities.Name: Brisk

Abilities.Name: Toll the Bells

CHINGLING.Pokedex: There is an orb inside its mouth. When it hops, the orb bounces all over and makes a ringing sound.

STUNKY.Name: Stunky

Abilities.Name: Stench
Abilities.Description: Attacks have a 50% chance to cause the target to flinch.

Abilities.Name: Pure Energy
Abilities.Description: Raises the Pokémon's Sp. Atk by 50%, including Style Values and other bonuses.

STUNKY.Pokedex: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

SKUNTANK.Name: Skuntank

Abilities.Name: Stench
Abilities.Description: Attacks have a 50% chance to cause the target to flinch.

Abilities.Name: Pure Energy
Abilities.Description: Raises the Pokémon's Sp. Atk by 50%, including Style Values and other bonuses.

SKUNTANK.Pokedex: It sprays a stinky fluid from its tail. The fluid smells worse the longer it is allowed to fester.

BRONZOR.Name: Bronzor

Abilities.Name: Levitate
Abilities.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Toll Danger
Abilities.Description: When a Total Eclipse occurs, heals for 50% max HP and uses Heal Bell.

BRONZOR.Pokedex: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

BRONZONG.Name: Bronzong

Abilities.Name: Levitate
Abilities.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Toll Danger
Abilities.Description: When a Total Eclipse occurs, heals for 50% max HP and uses Heal Bell.

BRONZONG.Pokedex: Ancient people believed that petitioning Bronzong for rain was the way to make crops grow.

BONSLY.Name: Bonsly

Abilities.Name: Desiccate

Abilities.Description: Gives priority to status moves, but makes Dark-types immune to them.

BONSLY.Pokedex: It prefers an arid atmosphere. It leaks water that looks like tears when adjusting its moisture level.

MIMEJR.Name: Mime Jr.

Abilities.Name: Decontamination

MIMEJR.Pokedex: It habitually mimics foes. Once mimicked, the foe cannot take its eyes off this Pokémon.

HAPPINY.Name: Happiny

Abilities.Name: Serene Grace

Abilities.Name: Bliss

HAPPINY.Pokedex: It carefully carries a round, white rock that it thinks is an egg. It's bothered by how curly its hair looks.

CHATOT.Name: Chatot

Abilities.Name: Loud
Abilities.Description: Boosts power of sound-based moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

CHATOT.Pokedex: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

SPIRITOMB.Name: Spiritomb

Abilities.Name: Bad Influence

SPIRITOMB.Pokedex: All Spiritomb's mischief and misdeeds compelled a traveler to use a mysterious spell to bind Spiritomb to an odd keystone.

GIBLE.Name: Gible

Abilities.Name: Rough Skin

Abilities.Name: Sand Shroud
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage in a sandstorm.

GIBLE.Pokedex: Gible attacks anything that moves, and it drags whatever it catches into the crevice that is its lair. Despite the big mouth, Gible's stomach is small.

GABITE.Name: Gabite

Abilities.Name: Rough Skin
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against it inflict 1/8th max HP damage to the foe.

Abilities.Name: Sand Shroud
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage in a sandstorm.

GABITE.Pokedex: Jewels are buried in the caves these Pokémon nest in, but you'll be torn apart by claws and fangs the moment you enter one of these caves.

GARCHOMP.Name: Garchomp

Abilities.Name: Rough Skin
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against it inflict 1/8th max HP damage to the foe.

Abilities.Name: Sands Macabre

GARCHOMP.Pokedex: Garchomp makes its home in volcanic mountains. It flies through the sky as fast as a jet airplane, hunting down as much prey as it can.

MUNCHLAX.Name: Munchlax

Abilities.Name: Gluttony

Abilities.Name: Thick Fat

MUNCHLAX.Pokedex: It conceals food under the long fur on its body. It carts around this food stash and swallows it without chewing.

RIOLU.Name: Riolu

LUCARIO.Name: Lucario

Abilities.Name: Honorable

Abilities.Name: Inner Focus
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.

LUCARIO.Pokedex: By reading the auras of all things, it can tell how others are feeling from over half a mile away.

HIPPOPOTAS.Name: Hippopotas

Abilities.Name: Sand Stream

Abilities.Name: Glass Firing
Abilities.Description: Immune to Fire-type moves and raises both defensive stats if hit by one.

HIPPOPOTAS.Pokedex: It enshrouds itself with sand to protect itself from germs. It does not enjoy getting wet.

HIPPOWDON.Name: Hippowdon

Abilities.Name: Sand Stream
Abilities.Description: Summons a sandstorm for 4 turns when it enters battle.

Abilities.Name: Glass Firing
Abilities.Description: Immune to Fire-type moves and raises both defensive stats if hit by one.

HIPPOWDON.Pokedex: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.

SKORUPI.Name: Skorupi

Abilities.Name: Darkened Skies

Abilities.Name: Merciless
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are critical against poisoned targets.

SKORUPI.Pokedex: It burrows under the sand to lie in wait for prey. Its tail claws can inject its prey with a savage poison.

DRAPION.Name: Drapion

Abilities.Name: Darkened Skies
Abilities.Description: Powers up Dark-type moves by 50% in sandstorm.

Abilities.Name: Merciless
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are critical against poisoned targets.

DRAPION.Pokedex: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

CROAGUNK.Name: Croagunk

Abilities.Name: Prankster
Abilities.Description: Gives priority to status moves, but makes Dark-types immune to them.

Abilities.Description: Restores 1/8 HP in rain, 1/4 when hit by Water-type moves. Loses 1/8 in sunshine, takes 25% more from Fire-type moves.

CROAGUNK.Pokedex: Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a poison jab.

TOXICROAK.Name: Toxicroak

Abilities.Name: Prankster
Abilities.Description: Gives priority to status moves, but makes Dark-types immune to them.

Abilities.Name: Dry Skin
Abilities.Description: Restores 1/8 HP in rain, 1/4 when hit by Water-type moves. Loses 1/8 in sunshine, takes 25% more from Fire-type moves.

TOXICROAK.Pokedex: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.

CARNIVINE.Name: Carnivine

Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of biting moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Analytic

CARNIVINE.Pokedex: It binds itself to trees in marshes. It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling drool and gulps them down.

FINNEON.Name: Finneon

Abilities.Name: Skill Link
Abilities.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves.

Abilities.Name: Luring
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are critical against dizzy targets.

FINNEON.Pokedex: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.

LUMINEON.Name: Lumineon

Abilities.Name: Skill Link
Abilities.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves.

Abilities.Name: Luring
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are critical against dizzy targets.

LUMINEON.Pokedex: To avoid detection by predators, it crawls along the seafloor using the two fins on its chest.

MANTYKE.Name: Mantyke

MANTYKE.Pokedex: When it swims close to the surface of the ocean, people aboard ships are able to observe the pattern on its back.

SNOVER.Name: Snover

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

SNOVER.Pokedex: In the spring, it grows berries with the texture of frozen treats around its belly.

ABOMASNOW.Name: Abomasnow

Abilities.Name: Frost Scatter
Abilities.Description: Summons a hailstorm for four turns when hit by an attack.

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

ABOMASNOW.Pokedex: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

WEAVILE.Name: Weavile

Abilities.Name: Lunatic
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 30% in moonglow.

MAGNEZONE.Name: Magnezone

Abilities.Name: Analytic
Abilities.Description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last by 30%.

Abilities.Name: No Guard
Abilities.Description: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.

MAGNEZONE.Pokedex: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.

LICKILICKY.Name: Lickilicky

RHYPERIOR.Name: Rhyperior

Abilities.Name: Reckless

RHYPERIOR.Pokedex: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. Geodude are shot at rare times.

TANGROWTH.Name: Tangrowth

Abilities.Description: Deals 30% more damage when it's slower than the target.

Abilities.Name: Tangling Hair
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed by three steps.

TANGROWTH.Pokedex: Its vines grow so profusely that, in the warm season, you can't even see its eyes.

ELECTIVIRE.Name: Electivire

Abilities.Description: Powers up Fighting-type moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Adrenaline Rush
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by four steps when its HP is lowered below half.

ELECTIVIRE.Pokedex: In terms of electrical-energy output, Electivire is one of the best among all Electric Pokémon. It discharges high-voltage currents from its tails.

MAGMORTAR.Name: Magmortar

Abilities.Name: Mega Launcher
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of pulse moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Scalding Smoke
Abilities.Description: Powers up Poison-type moves by 50%.

MAGMORTAR.Pokedex: When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

TOGEKISS.Name: Togekiss

Abilities.Name: Super Luck
Abilities.Description: Four times more likely for moves to be critical.

Abilities.Name: Serene Grace
Abilities.Description: Doubles the likelihood of the user's random added effects activating.

TOGEKISS.Pokedex: It shares many blessings with people who respect one another's rights and avoid needless strife.

YANMEGA.Name: Yanmega

Abilities.Name: Darter
Abilities.Description: Takes 30% less move damage if a Tailwind is blowing.

YANMEGA.Pokedex: This six-legged Pokémon is easily capable of transporting an adult in flight. The wings on its tail help it stay balanced.

LEAFEON.Name: Leafeon

LEAFEON.Pokedex: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.

GLACEON.Name: Glaceon

Abilities.Name: Snow Shroud
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage in a hailstorm.

Abilities.Name: Brilliant Flurry
Abilities.Description: If an attack lowers its HP to half or less, lowers all of the attacker's stats.

GLACEON.Pokedex: It lowers its body heat to freeze its fur. The hairs then become like needles it can fire.

GLISCOR.Name: Gliscor

Abilities.Name: Grotesque Vitals
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/12th HP every turn. Protected from being poisoned.

Abilities.Name: Sand Shroud
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage in a sandstorm.

GLISCOR.Pokedex: Its flight is soundless. It uses its lengthy tail to carry off its prey... Then its elongated fangs do the rest.

MAMOSWINE.Name: Mamoswine

Abilities.Name: Thick Fat
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fire- and Ice-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Ice Mirror

MAMOSWINE.Pokedex: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

PORYGONZ.Name: Porygon-Z

Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dragon- and Fairy-type attacks.

PORYGONZ.Pokedex: Its programming was modified to enable it to travel through alien dimensions. Seems there might have been an error...

GALLADE.Name: Gallade

Abilities.Name: Swordplay
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of blade moves by 30%.

GALLADE.Pokedex: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

PROBOPASS.Name: Probopass

DUSKNOIR.Name: Dusknoir

FROSLASS.Name: Froslass

Abilities.Description: Moves used on the Pokémon are disabled for three turns.

Abilities.Description: Extends hail by two turns after knocking out any Pokémon.

ROTOM.Name: Rotom

Abilities.Name: Levitate
Abilities.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

Abilities.Description: The Pokémon and other battlers don't benefit from same-type attacking bonus.

UXIE.Name: Uxie

UXIE.Pokedex: Known as "The Being of Knowledge." It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

MESPRIT.Name: Mesprit

Abilities.Name: Emotion Aura
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, creates an Emotion Room for five turns, switching Abilities every turn.

MESPRIT.Pokedex: Known as "The Being of Emotion." It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

AZELF.Name: Azelf

Abilities.Name: Will Aura
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, creates a Willful Room for five turns, reducing all hits by 30 damage.

AZELF.Pokedex: Known as "The Being of Willpower." It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

DIALGA.Name: Dialga

DIALGA.Pokedex: A Pokémon spoken of in legend. It is said that time began moving when Dialga was born.

PALKIA.Name: Palkia

Abilities.Name: Realist
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dragon- and Fairy-type attacks.

PALKIA.Pokedex: It is said to live in a gap in the spatial dimension parallel to ours. It appears in mythology.

HEATRAN.Name: Heatran

Abilities.Description: Immune to Fire-type moves, and raises both attacking stats if hit by one.

REGIGIGAS.Name: Regigigas

GIRATINA.Name: Giratina

Abilities.Name: Pressure

GIRATINA.Pokedex: This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is distorted and strange.

CRESSELIA.Name: Cresselia

PHIONE.Name: Phione

PHIONE.Pokedex: It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

MANAPHY.Name: Manaphy

Abilities.Name: Overflowing Heart
Abilities.Description: Copies the base stats of the Pokémon it switches in to replace.

ARCEUS.Name: Arceus

Abilities.Description: If its stats would be changed, instead they're changed half as much in the opposite direction (rounded up).

Abilities.Name: Inner Light

Abilities.Name: Heat Savor
Abilities.Description: Heals by 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in sunshine.

Abilities.Description: Heals by 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in sunshine.

Abilities.Description: Wild Pokemon are more likely to hold items and to be species you've never caught before.

Abilities.Name: Break Through

Abilities.Description: Wild Pokemon are more likely to hold items and to be species you've never caught before.

Abilities.Description: Raises Atk and Sp. Atk by two steps each when its HP is lowered below half.

Abilities.Name: Friend Guard
Abilities.Description: Reduces damage done to allies by 25%.

Abilities.Name: Ripen
Abilities.Description: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

Abilities.Name: Unburden
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed if a held item is consumed in battle.

TRANQUILL.Name: Tranquill

Abilities.Name: Deterrent

Abilities.Name: Super Luck

TRANQUILL.Pokedex: No matter where in the world it goes, it knows where its nest is, so it never gets separated from its Trainer.

UNFEZANT.Name: Unfezant

Abilities.Name: Deterrent

BLITZLE.Name: Blitzle

ZEBSTRIKA.Name: Zebstrika

Abilities.Name: Sap Sipper
Abilities.Description: Immune to Grass-type moves, and raises both attacking stats when hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Reckless
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves that have recoil damage by 30%.

ZEBSTRIKA.Pokedex: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.

BOLDORE.Name: Boldore

Abilities.Name: Solar Cell

Abilities.Name: Unburden
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed if a held item is consumed in battle.

Abilities.Description: Raises Speed if a held item is consumed in battle.

Abilities.Name: Clumsy Kinesis

HELIOPTILE.Name: Helioptile

Abilities.Name: Water Absorb
Abilities.Description: Immune to Water-type moves and restores HP when hit by one.

HELIOPTILE.Pokedex: The frills on either side of its head have cells that generate electricity when exposed to sunlight.

HELIOLISK.Name: Heliolisk

Abilities.Name: Solar Power
Abilities.Description: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

Abilities.Name: Water Absorb
Abilities.Description: Immune to Water-type moves and restores HP when hit by one.

HELIOLISK.Pokedex: It stimulates its muscles with electricity, boosting the strength in its legs and enabling it to run 100 yards in five seconds.

TYRUNT.Name: Tyrunt

Abilities.Name: Wrath Instinct
Abilities.Description: Uses Dragon Dance if an attack lowers its HP to half or below.

Abilities.Name: Rock Head
Abilities.Description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

TYRUNT.Pokedex: This is an ancient Pokémon, revived in modern times. It has a violent disposition, and it'll tear apart anything it gets between its hefty jaws.

TYRANTRUM.Name: Tyrantrum

Abilities.Name: Wrath Instinct
Abilities.Description: Uses Dragon Dance if an attack lowers its HP to half or below.

Abilities.Name: Rock Head
Abilities.Description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

TYRANTRUM.Pokedex: This Pokémon is from about 100,000,000 years ago. It has the presence of a king, vicious but magnificent.

AMAURA.Name: Amaura

Abilities.Name: Aurora Prism
Abilities.Description: Attacks this Pokémon uses that don't share a type with it are boosted by 50%. It can't use attacks of its own types.

Abilities.Name: Snow Warning
Abilities.Description: Summons a hailstorm for 4 turns when it enters battle.

AMAURA.Pokedex: This Pokémon was successfully restored from a fossil. In the past, it lived with others of its kind in cold lands where there were fewer predators.

AURORUS.Name: Aurorus

Abilities.Name: Aurora Prism
Abilities.Description: Attacks this Pokémon uses that don't share a type with it are boosted by 50%. It can't use attacks of its own types.

Abilities.Name: Snow Warning
Abilities.Description: Summons a hailstorm for 4 turns when it enters battle.

AURORUS.Pokedex: Aurorus was restored from a fossil. It's said that when this Pokémon howls, auroras appear in the night sky.

SYLVEON.Name: Sylveon

Abilities.Name: Beguiling
Abilities.Description: Special attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to dizzy the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Dragon Slayer
Abilities.Description: Immune to Dragon-type moves. Deals double damage to Dragon-types.

SYLVEON.Pokedex: Sylveon's ribbon-like feelers emit an aura that erases any sense of hostility, enabling it to stop fights. It wraps its feelers to its Trainer in order to read their feelings.

HAWLUCHA.Name: Hawlucha

Abilities.Name: Team Player
Abilities.Description: Deals 25% more move damage for each ally in battle.

Abilities.Name: Unburden
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed if a held item is consumed in battle.

HAWLUCHA.Pokedex: With its wings, it controls its position in the air. It likes to attack from above, a maneuver that is difficult to defend against.

DEDENNE.Name: Dedenne

Abilities.Name: Cheek Pouch
Abilities.Description: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it restores 33% of its max health.

Abilities.Name: Lifeline
Abilities.Description: At the end of each turn, heals self by 1/20th and a party member by the amount the Pokémon was healed.

DEDENNE.Pokedex: It uses its tail to absorb electricity from power plants or from outlets in houses, and then it fires the electricity from its whiskers.

CARBINK.Name: Carbink

Abilities.Name: Clear Body
Abilities.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

CARBINK.Pokedex: It's said that somewhere in the world, there's a mineral vein housing a large pack of slumbering Carbink. It's also said that this pack has a queen.

GOOMY.Name: Goomy

Abilities.Name: Gooey
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed and Attack.

Abilities.Name: Hydration
Abilities.Description: Heals status problems each turn if it is raining.

GOOMY.Pokedex: It's covered in a slimy membrane that makes any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.

SLIGGOO.Name: Sliggoo

Abilities.Name: Gooey
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed and Attack.

Abilities.Name: Hydration
Abilities.Description: Heals status problems each turn if it is raining.

SLIGGOO.Pokedex: It's very friendly toward people. If you grow close to it, Goodra will hug you with its sticky, slime-covered body. Don't get mad.

GOODRA.Name: Goodra

Abilities.Name: Gooey
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed and Attack.

Abilities.Name: Hydration
Abilities.Description: Heals status problems each turn if it is raining.

GOODRA.Pokedex: It attacks with retractable horns. It throws a punch that's the equivalent of the force of a hundred pro boxers.

KLEFKI.Name: Klefki

Abilities.Name: Prankster
Abilities.Description: Gives priority to status moves, but makes Dark-types immune to them.

Abilities.Name: Kleptomaniac
Abilities.Description: Uses Snatch upon entry, stealing self-targeting status moves.

KLEFKI.Pokedex: It never lets go of a key that it likes, so people give it the keys to vaults and safes as a way to prevent crime.

PHANTUMP.Name: Phantump

Abilities.Name: Schadenfreude
Abilities.Description: Restores 1/4th health after any foe faints.

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

PHANTUMP.Pokedex: According to old tales, these Pokémon are stumps possessed by the spirits of children who died while lost in the forest.

TREVENANT.Name: Trevenant

Abilities.Name: Schadenfreude
Abilities.Description: Restores 1/4th health after any foe faints.

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

TREVENANT.Pokedex: Using its roots as a nervous system, it controls the trees in the forest. It's kind to the Pokémon that reside in its body.

PUMPKABOO.Name: Pumpkaboo

Abilities.Name: Flourishing
Abilities.Description: Grows at the end of each turn, slowing down but improving other stats.

Abilities.Name: Unafraid
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dark- and Bug-type moves.

PUMPKABOO.Pokedex: It is said to carry wandering spirits to the place where they belong so they can move on.

GOURGEIST.Name: Gourgeist

Abilities.Name: Flourishing
Abilities.Description: Grows at the end of each turn, slowing down but improving other stats.

Abilities.Name: Unafraid
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dark- and Bug-type moves.

GOURGEIST.Pokedex: It enwraps its prey in its hairlike arms. It sings joyfully as it observes the suffering of its prey.

BERGMITE.Name: Bergmite

Abilities.Name: Chilled Body
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to frostbite the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Bitter Cold
Abilities.Description: Causes hail to deal double damage and increase Defense of Ice types by 2.0x instead of 1.5x.

BERGMITE.Pokedex: Using air of -50 degrees Fahrenheit, they freeze opponents solid. They live in herds above the snow line on mountains.

AVALUGG.Name: Avalugg

Abilities.Name: Chilled Body
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to frostbite the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Bitter Cold
Abilities.Description: Causes hail to deal double damage and increase Defense of Ice types by 2.0x instead of 1.5x.

AVALUGG.Pokedex: The way several Bergmite and Dreepy like to huddle on its back makes it look like an aircraft carrier made of ice.

NOIBAT.Name: Noibat

Abilities.Name: Terrorize
Abilities.Description: Moves that can flinch are twice as likely to do so.

Abilities.Name: Fell Omen
Abilities.Description: During eclipse, gets a 30% boost to Sp. Atk.

NOIBAT.Pokedex: Even a robust wrestler will become dizzy and unable to stand when exposed to its 200,000-hertz ultrasonic waves.

NOIVERN.Name: Noivern

Abilities.Name: Terrorize
Abilities.Description: Moves that can flinch are twice as likely to do so.

Abilities.Name: Fell Omen
Abilities.Description: During eclipse, gets a 30% boost to Sp. Atk.

NOIVERN.Pokedex: The ultrasonic waves it emits from its ears can reduce a large boulder to pebbles. It swoops out of the dark to attack.

XERNEAS.Name: Xerneas

Abilities.Name: Fairy Aura
Abilities.Description: Powers up each Pokémon's Fairy-type moves.

XERNEAS.Pokedex: When the horns on its head shine in seven colors, it is said to be sharing everlasting life.

YVELTAL.Name: Yveltal

Abilities.Name: Dark Aura
Abilities.Description: Powers up each Pokémon's Dark-type moves.

YVELTAL.Pokedex: When its life comes to an end, it absorbs the life energy of every living thing and turns into a cocoon once more.

ZYGARDE.Name: Zygarde

Abilities.Name: Aura Break
Abilities.Description: Reverses "Aura" Abilities to weaken affected moves.

ZYGARDE.Pokedex: Some say it can change to an even more powerful form when battling those who threaten the ecosystem.

DIANCIE.Name: Diancie

Abilities.Name: Clear Body
Abilities.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

DIANCIE.Pokedex: It can instantly create many diamonds by compressing the carbon in the air between its hands.

HOOPA.Name: Hoopa

Abilities.Name: Magician
Abilities.Description: Steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits.

HOOPA.Pokedex: It gathers things it likes and passes them through its loop to teleport them to a secret place.

VOLCANION.Name: Volcanion

Abilities.Name: Water Absorb
Abilities.Description: Immune to Water-type moves and restores HP when hit by one.

VOLCANION.Pokedex: It expels its internal steam from the arms on its back. It has enough power to blow away a mountain.

ROWLET.Name: Rowlet

Abilities.Name: Snow Shroud
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage in a hailstorm.

Abilities.Name: Infiltrator
Abilities.Description: Ignores screens and other barriers, Substitute, and boosted defensive stats.

ROWLET.Pokedex: It sends its feathers, which are as sharp as blades, flying in attack. Its legs are strong, so its kicks are also formidable.

DARTRIX.Name: Dartrix

Abilities.Name: Snow Shroud
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage in a hailstorm.

Abilities.Name: Infiltrator
Abilities.Description: Ignores screens and other barriers, Substitute, and boosted defensive stats.

DARTRIX.Pokedex: This narcissistic Pokémon is a clean freak. If you don't groom it diligently, it will stop listening to you.

DECIDUEYE.Name: Decidueye

Abilities.Name: Snow Shroud
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage in a hailstorm.

LITTEN.Name: Litten

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Double Check
Abilities.Description: Deals 50% more damage to targets who have already taken damage this turn.

LITTEN.Pokedex: If you try too hard to get close to it, it won't open up to you. Even if you do grow close, giving it too much affection is still a no-no.

TORRACAT.Name: Torracat

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Double Check
Abilities.Description: Deals 50% more damage to targets who have already taken damage this turn.

TORRACAT.Pokedex: It can act spoiled if it grows close to its Trainer. A powerful Pokémon, its sharp claws can leave its Trainer's whole body covered in scratches.

INCINEROAR.Name: Incineroar

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Double Check
Abilities.Description: Deals 50% more damage to targets who have already taken damage this turn.

INCINEROAR.Pokedex: Although it's rough mannered and egotistical, it finds beating down unworthy opponents boring. It gets motivated for stronger opponents.

POPPLIO.Name: Popplio

Abilities.Name: Maestro
Abilities.Description: Doubles the speed of Sound-based moves.

Abilities.Name: Solo Nocturne
Abilities.Description: Doubles Defense in moonglow.

POPPLIO.Pokedex: The balloons it inflates with its nose grow larger and larger as it practices day by day.

BRIONNE.Name: Brionne

Abilities.Name: Maestro
Abilities.Description: Doubles the speed of Sound-based moves.

Abilities.Name: Solo Nocturne
Abilities.Description: Doubles Defense in moonglow.

BRIONNE.Pokedex: It gets excited when it sees a dance it doesn't know. This hard worker practices diligently until it can learn that dance.

PRIMARINA.Name: Primarina

Abilities.Name: Maestro
Abilities.Description: Doubles the speed of Sound-based moves.

Abilities.Name: Solo Nocturne
Abilities.Description: Doubles Defense in moonglow.

PRIMARINA.Pokedex: To Primarina, every battle is a stage. It takes down its prey with beautiful singing and dancing.

PIKIPEK.Name: Pikipek

Abilities.Name: Nesting
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/12th HP per turn if there's a weather. Immune to weather downsides.

Abilities.Name: Skill Link
Abilities.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves.

PIKIPEK.Pokedex: It pecks at trees with its hard beak. You can get some idea of its mood or condition from the rhythm of its pecking.

TRUMBEAK.Name: Trumbeak

Abilities.Name: Nesting
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/12th HP per turn if there's a weather. Immune to weather downsides.

Abilities.Name: Skill Link
Abilities.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves.

TRUMBEAK.Pokedex: It can bend the tip of its beak to produce over a hundred different cries at will.

TOUCANNON.Name: Toucannon

Abilities.Name: Nesting
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/12th HP per turn if there's a weather. Immune to weather downsides.

Abilities.Name: Skill Link
Abilities.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves.

TOUCANNON.Pokedex: They smack beaks with others of their kind to communicate. The strength and number of hits tell each other how they feel.

YUNGOOS.Name: Yungoos

Abilities.Name: Realist
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dragon- and Fairy-type attacks.

YUNGOOS.Pokedex: Its stomach takes up most of its long torso. It's a big eater, so the amount Trainers have to spend on its food is no laughing matter.

GUMSHOOS.Name: Gumshoos

Abilities.Name: Investigator
Abilities.Description: At the beginning of each turn, gives clues about a foe's plan.

Abilities.Name: Realist
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dragon- and Fairy-type attacks.

GUMSHOOS.Pokedex: Although it wasn't originally found in Alola, this Pokémon was brought over a long time ago when there was a huge Rattata outbreak.

GRUBBIN.Name: Grubbin

Abilities.Name: Emergency Power
Abilities.Description: Uses Lightning Dance if an attack lowers its HP to half or below.

Abilities.Name: Vital Spirit
Abilities.Description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

GRUBBIN.Pokedex: If you find its nest, you shouldn't stick your hand inside. You'll get bitten by an irritated Grubbin.

CHARJABUG.Name: Charjabug

Abilities.Name: Emergency Power
Abilities.Description: Uses Lightning Dance if an attack lowers its HP to half or below.

Abilities.Name: Vital Spirit
Abilities.Description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

CHARJABUG.Pokedex: It buries itself in fallen leaves and barely moves, munching away on humus. If you accidentally step on one, you'll get a shock!

VIKAVOLT.Name: Vikavolt

Abilities.Name: Emergency Power
Abilities.Description: Uses Lightning Dance if an attack lowers its HP to half or below.

Abilities.Name: Levitate
Abilities.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

VIKAVOLT.Pokedex: It has an organ that generates electricity in its abdomen. It concentrates energy in its jaws and fires off jolts of electricity.

CRABRAWLER.Name: Crabrawler

Abilities.Description: It avoids hazards and can't be knocked out with one hit.

Abilities.Name: Iron Fist
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 30%.

CRABRAWLER.Pokedex: Its hard pincers are well suited to both offense and defense. Fights between two Crabrawler are like boxing matches.

CRABOMINABLE.Name: Crabominable

Abilities.Name: Survivalist
Abilities.Description: It avoids hazards and can't be knocked out with one hit.

Abilities.Name: Iron Fist
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 30%.

CRABOMINABLE.Pokedex: It stores coldness in its pincers and pummels its foes. It can even smash thick walls of ice to bits!

ORICORIO.Name: Oricorio

Abilities.Name: Dancer
Abilities.Description: Repeats another Pokémon's dance move immediately.

ORICORIO.Pokedex: It wins the hearts of its enemies with its passionate dancing and then uses the opening it creates to burn them up with blazing flames.

CUTIEFLY.Name: Cutiefly

Abilities.Name: Candy Veil
Abilities.Description: Prevents itself and allies from being poisoned, leeched, or dizzied.

Abilities.Name: Impulsive
Abilities.Description: When this Pokémon becomes statused, its Sp. Atk is raised by four steps.

CUTIEFLY.Pokedex: Cutiefly is able to detect the aura of living things, which it uses to find flowers. Cutiefly tend to gather around beings feeling strong emotions.

RIBOMBEE.Name: Ribombee

Abilities.Name: Candy Veil
Abilities.Description: Prevents itself and allies from being poisoned, leeched, or dizzied.

Abilities.Name: Impulsive
Abilities.Description: When this Pokémon becomes statused, its Sp. Atk is raised by four steps.

RIBOMBEE.Pokedex: Ribombee hates rain as it turns its hair dirty and its pollen damp. When storms are on the horizon, Ribombee hides in tree hollows waiting for it to pass.

ROCKRUFF.Name: Rockruff

Abilities.Name: Vital Spirit
Abilities.Description: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.

ROCKRUFF.Pokedex: As they develop, their disposition grows more violent and aggressive. Many Trainers find them too much to handle and abandon them.

LYCANROC.Name: Lycanroc

Abilities.Name: Lycanthrope
Abilities.Description: Transforms into Midnight Form at the Full Moon. Ability becomes No Guard.

LYCANROC.Pokedex: The sharp rocks in its mane can cut like knives. Lycanroc wears its prey down by degrees before finishing them off.

WISHIWASHI.Name: Wishiwashi

Abilities.Name: Schooling
Abilities.Description: Forms a powerful school while it has a lot of HP.

WISHIWASHI.Pokedex: They're weak, so they move in schools. However, they can also often be seen all alone, having strayed from the school.

MAREANIE.Name: Mareanie

Abilities.Name: Noxious
Abilities.Description: Reduces each other Pokémon's HP by 1/12th at the end of each turn.

Abilities.Name: Regenerator
Abilities.Description: Restores 25% of max HP when withdrawn from battle.

MAREANIE.Pokedex: They eat Corsola branches, so Mareanie are hated by craftsmen who work with Corsola branches that have naturally fallen off.

TOXAPEX.Name: Toxapex

Abilities.Name: Noxious
Abilities.Description: Reduces each other Pokémon's HP by 1/12th at the end of each turn.

Abilities.Name: Regenerator
Abilities.Description: Restores 25% of max HP when withdrawn from battle.

TOXAPEX.Pokedex: To attack, this Pokémon sends toxic spikes flying at its enemies. Ones that come close get mown down by the claws on its feet.

MUDBRAY.Name: Mudbray

Abilities.Name: Iron Heel
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of kicking moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Stamina
Abilities.Description: Boosts Defense by two steps when hit by an attack.

MUDBRAY.Pokedex: It loves playing in the mud. If it isn't showered with mud on a daily basis, it gets stressed out and stops listening to its Trainer.

MUDSDALE.Name: Mudsdale

Abilities.Name: Iron Heel
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of kicking moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Stamina
Abilities.Description: Boosts Defense by two steps when hit by an attack.

MUDSDALE.Pokedex: It remains calm and unmoving no matter the situation. It mixes dirt with the saliva in its mouth to make a special kind of mud.

DEWPIDER.Name: Dewpider

Abilities.Name: Poison Absorb
Abilities.Description: Grants immunity to Poison-type moves and restores HP if hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Water Bubble
Abilities.Description: Weakens incoming Fire-type moves, and doubles Water-type damage.

DEWPIDER.Pokedex: When two Dewpider meet, they display their water bubbles to each other. Then the one with the smaller bubble gets out of the other's way.

ARAQUANID.Name: Araquanid

Abilities.Name: Poison Absorb
Abilities.Description: Grants immunity to Poison-type moves and restores HP if hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Water Bubble
Abilities.Description: Weakens incoming Fire-type moves, and doubles Water-type damage.

ARAQUANID.Pokedex: It usually passes its time in the water. When its belly is full, it stores its subdued prey in the water bubble on its head.

FOMANTIS.Name: Fomantis

Abilities.Name: Contrary
Abilities.Description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

Abilities.Name: Polarizing
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, creates a Quality Room for five turns, exaggerating type matchups.

FOMANTIS.Pokedex: When the sun rises, Fomantis spreads its four leaves and bathes in the sunlight. The tip of its head has a pleasant aroma.

LURANTIS.Name: Lurantis

Abilities.Name: Contrary
Abilities.Description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

Abilities.Name: Polarizing
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, creates a Quality Room for five turns, exaggerating type matchups.

LURANTIS.Pokedex: For self-protection, it pretends to be a bug Pokémon. Both of its arms bear keen-edged petals.

MORELULL.Name: Morelull

Abilities.Name: Moon Basking
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in moonglow.

Abilities.Name: Torpor Sap
Abilities.Description: Restores its HP by 25% of the damage it deals to sleeping targets.

MORELULL.Pokedex: It scatters its shining spores around itself. Even though they're dangerous, nighttime tours of forests where Morelull live are popular.

SHIINOTIC.Name: Shiinotic

Abilities.Name: Moon Basking
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in moonglow.

Abilities.Name: Torpor Sap
Abilities.Description: Restores its HP by 25% of the damage it deals to sleeping targets.

SHIINOTIC.Pokedex: It puts its prey to sleep and siphons off their vitality through the tip of its arms. If one of its kind is weakened, it helps by sending it vitality.

SALANDIT.Name: Salandit

Abilities.Name: Expertise
Abilities.Description: Powers up super-effective moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Domineering
Abilities.Description: Reduces move damage taken by 50% when HP is full. Can't be dizzied.

SALANDIT.Pokedex: The males will do whatever the females tell them. They give the females most of their food.

SALAZZLE.Name: Salazzle

Abilities.Name: Expertise
Abilities.Description: Powers up super-effective moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Domineering
Abilities.Description: Reduces move damage taken by 50% when HP is full. Can't be dizzied.

SALAZZLE.Pokedex: Salazzle lives deep in caves and forces the Salandit it has attracted with its pheromones to serve it.

STUFFUL.Name: Stufful

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Lunatic
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 30% in moonglow.

STUFFUL.Pokedex: It boasts power enough to split large trees in half. The organ on its rear releases an odor that it uses to communicate with others of its kind.

BEWEAR.Name: Bewear

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Lunatic
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 30% in moonglow.

BEWEAR.Pokedex: It waves its hands wildly in intimidation and warning. Life is over for anyone who doesn't run away as fast as possible.

BOUNSWEET.Name: Bounsweet

Abilities.Name: Punisher
Abilities.Description: Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to leech the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Swift Stomps

BOUNSWEET.Pokedex: Because of its sweet, delicious aroma, bird Pokémon are always after it, but it's not intelligent enough to care.

STEENEE.Name: Steenee

Abilities.Name: Punisher
Abilities.Description: Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to leech the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Swift Stomps
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Speed of kicking moves.

STEENEE.Pokedex: It's protected by its hard sepals, so it plays with bird Pokémon without worry. They peck it relentlessly, but it doesn't care.

TSAREENA.Name: Tsareena

Abilities.Name: Punisher
Abilities.Description: Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to leech the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Swift Stomps
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Speed of kicking moves.

TSAREENA.Pokedex: A master of grand and beautiful kicks, it can knock out even kickboxing champions with a single blow.

COMFEY.Name: Comfey

COMFEY.Pokedex: It stretches sticky vines out from its head and picks flowers to adorn itself with. When it doesn't have any flowers, it feels uneasy.

ORANGURU.Name: Oranguru

ORANGURU.Pokedex: It normally spends its time meditating in the treetops. It throws Poké Balls and gives other Pokémon orders as it pleases.

WIMPOD.Name: Wimpod

WIMPOD.Pokedex: It will pick up anything it finds on the ground. Sometimes it finds coins, so Murkrow and Meowth will go after it.

GOLISOPOD.Name: Golisopod

GOLISOPOD.Pokedex: The shell covering its body is as hard as diamond. This Pokémon will do anything it takes to win.

SANDYGAST.Name: Sandygast

Abilities.Name: Grit
Abilities.Description: Boosts Sp. Def by two steps when hit by an attack.

Abilities.Name: Sand Shroud
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage in a sandstorm.

SANDYGAST.Pokedex: It likes the shovel on its head, so Sandygast will get serious and fight any children who come to take it back.

PALOSSAND.Name: Palossand

Abilities.Name: Grit
Abilities.Description: Boosts Sp. Def by two steps when hit by an attack.

Abilities.Name: Sand Shroud
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage in a sandstorm.

PALOSSAND.Pokedex: Each of its grains of sand has its own will. Palossand eats small Pokémon and siphons away their vital essence while they're still alive.

PYUKUMUKU.Name: Pyukumuku

Abilities.Name: Innards Out
Abilities.Description: Damages an attacker that lands the finishing hit.

Abilities.Name: Realist
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dragon- and Fairy-type attacks.

PYUKUMUKU.Pokedex: The tradition known as Pyukumuku chucking started from the custom of throwing Pyukumuku back into the sea after they wash onshore.

TYPENULL.Name: Type: Null

Abilities.Name: Adapted
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves of the same type by 33%.

Abilities.Name: Impervious
Abilities.Description: Protects from critical hits and from enemies lowering Defense or Sp. Def.

TYPENULL.Pokedex: A Pokémon weapon developed for a specific mission, it went berserk during an experiment, so it was cryogenically frozen.

SILVALLY.Name: Silvally

Abilities.Name: RKS System
Abilities.Description: Its type matches the memory disc it holds.

Abilities.Name: MU Protocol
Abilities.Description: Immune to the type of the memory disc it holds.

SILVALLY.Pokedex: This is its form once it has awakened and evolved. Freed from its heavy mask, its speed is greatly increased.

MINIOR.Name: Minior

Abilities.Name: Shields Down
Abilities.Description: It can't be statused while it has its shell. Below half HP its shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

Abilities.Name: Debris Field
Abilities.Description: Can't be statused due to its hard shell. Boosts Sp. Atk and Speed by 25% in sandstorm.

MINIOR.Pokedex: It lives in the ozone layer, where it becomes food for stronger Pokémon. When it tries to run away, it falls to the ground.

KOMALA.Name: Komala

Abilities.Name: Comatose
Abilities.Description: It's always drowsing, and attacks without waking.

Abilities.Name: Snoozefest
Abilities.Description: Whenever the Pokémon falls asleep, each other battler becomes drowsy.

KOMALA.Pokedex: It stays asleep from the moment it's born. When it falls into a deep sleep, it stops moving altogether.

TURTONATOR.Name: Turtonator

Abilities.Name: Vengeance
Abilities.Description: After an attack reduces its HP to half or less, deals 1/4 of the attacker's HP back to the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Harsh
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are critical against burned targets.

TURTONATOR.Pokedex: It lives in volcanoes and eats sulfur and other minerals. Materials from the food it eats form the basis of its explosive shell.

TOGEDEMARU.Name: Togedemaru

Abilities.Name: Plasma Globe
Abilities.Description: Attacks against the Pokémon deal 50% more damage, but the attacker takes 100% recoil.

Abilities.Name: Sudden Turn
Abilities.Description: Uses Rapid Spin after its first attack to clear hazards, raise Speed, and deal damage.

TOGEDEMARU.Pokedex: When it's surprised or agitated, the 14 fur spikes on its back will stand up involuntarily.

MIMIKYU.Name: Mimikyu

Abilities.Name: Disguise
Abilities.Description: Its shroud protects it from an attack just once.

MIMIKYU.Pokedex: Although it's a quiet, lonely Pokémon, if you try to look at what's under its rag, it will become agitated and resist violently.

BRUXISH.Name: Bruxish

Abilities.Name: Anarchic
Abilities.Description: Doubles Speed in eclipse.

Abilities.Name: Strong Jaw
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of biting moves by 50%.

BRUXISH.Pokedex: It burrows beneath the sand, radiating psychic power from the protuberance on its head. It waits for prey as it surveys the area.

DRAMPA.Name: Drampa

Abilities.Name: Berserk
Abilities.Description: Raises Atk and Sp. Atk by two steps each when its HP is lowered below half.

Abilities.Name: Apprehensive
Abilities.Description: Takes 30% less damage in eclipse, except in Total Eclipse.

DRAMPA.Pokedex: If a child it has made friends with is bullied, Drampa will find the bully's house and burn it to the ground.

DHELMISE.Name: Dhelmise

Abilities.Name: Rust & Wrack
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon is also Steel-type, but it takes 15% more damage from moves.

Abilities.Name: Kelp Link
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to leech the attacker.

DHELMISE.Pokedex: It wraps its prey in green seaweed and sucks away their vitality. It only likes to go after big prey like Wailord.

JANGMOO.Name: Jangmo-o

Abilities.Name: Sound Barrier
Abilities.Description: After using a sound move, raises both of the Pokémon's defensive stats.

Abilities.Name: Plot Armor
Abilities.Description: During eclipse, immune to status conditions and having its stats lowered by enemies.

JANGMOO.Pokedex: It smacks the scales on its head against rocks or against the ground to frighten its opponents. It can also contact its friends with these noises.

HAKAMOO.Name: Hakamo-o

Abilities.Name: Sound Barrier
Abilities.Description: After using a sound move, raises both of the Pokémon's defensive stats.

Abilities.Name: Plot Armor
Abilities.Description: During eclipse, immune to status conditions and having its stats lowered by enemies.

HAKAMOO.Pokedex: It makes noise by clanging its scales together. When the rhythm has reached its peak, Hakamo-o attacks.

KOMMOO.Name: Kommo-o

Abilities.Name: Sound Barrier
Abilities.Description: After using a sound move, raises both of the Pokémon's defensive stats.

Abilities.Name: Plot Armor
Abilities.Description: During eclipse, immune to status conditions and having its stats lowered by enemies.

KOMMOO.Pokedex: When it howls after finishing off its prey, the metallic sounds of its celebrating comrades can be heard from all around.

TAPUKOKO.Name: Tapu Koko

Abilities.Name: Storm Totem
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, summons a Turbulent Sky on the Pokémon's side for 6 turns.

TAPUKOKO.Pokedex: Although it's called a guardian deity, if a person or Pokémon puts it in a bad mood, it will become a malevolent deity and attack.

TAPULELE.Name: Tapu Lele

Abilities.Name: Flutter Totem
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, summons a Cruel Cocoon on the Pokémon's side for 6 turns.

TAPULELE.Pokedex: It heals the wounds of people and Pokémon by sprinkling them with its sparkling scales. This guardian deity is worshiped on Akala.

TAPUBULU.Name: Tapu Bulu

Abilities.Name: Wild Totem
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, summons a Primal Forest on the Pokémon's side for 6 turns.

TAPUBULU.Pokedex: Although it's called a guardian deity, it's violent enough to crush anyone it sees as an enemy.

TAPUFINI.Name: Tapu Fini

Abilities.Name: Fog Totem
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, summons a Misdirecting Fog on the Pokémon's side for 6 turns.

TAPUFINI.Pokedex: This guardian deity of Poni Island manipulates water. Because it lives deep within a thick fog, it came to be both feared and revered.

COSMOG.Name: Cosmog

Abilities.Name: Unaware
Abilities.Description: Ignores defensive stat changes in opponents it's hitting, and offensive stat stages in foes hitting it.

COSMOG.Pokedex: Even though its helpless, gaseous body can be blown away by the slightest breeze, it doesn't seem to care.

COSMOEM.Name: Cosmoem

Abilities.Name: Sturdy
Abilities.Description: It can't be knocked out with one hit.

COSMOEM.Pokedex: The king who ruled Alola in times of antiquity called it the "cocoon of the stars" and built an altar to worship it.

SOLGALEO.Name: Solgaleo

Abilities.Name: Full Metal Body
Abilities.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

SOLGALEO.Pokedex: Sometimes the result of its opening an Ultra Wormhole is that energy and life-forms from other worlds are called here to this world.

LUNALA.Name: Lunala

Abilities.Name: Shadow Shield
Abilities.Description: Resists damage while its HP is full.

LUNALA.Pokedex: Records of it exist in writings from long, long ago, where it was known by the name "the beast that calls the moon."

NIHILEGO.Name: Nihilego

Abilities.Name: Neurotoxin
Abilities.Description: While the Pokémon is unfainted (in battle or switched out), poisoned foes also suffer from dizzy.

NIHILEGO.Pokedex: A life-form from another world, it was dubbed a UB and is thought to produce a strong neurotoxin.

BUZZWOLE.Name: Buzzwole

Abilities.Name: Mass Attack
Abilities.Description: All Pokémon's damage is decreased proportional to their health remaining.

BUZZWOLE.Pokedex: Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

PHEROMOSA.Name: Pheromosa

Abilities.Name: Clean Freak
Abilities.Description: Boosts move damage by 50% while it has a status condition. However, it suffers double effect from status conditions.

PHEROMOSA.Pokedex: A life-form that lives in another world, its body is thin and supple, but it also possesses great power.

XURKITREE.Name: Xurkitree

Abilities.Name: Direct Current
Abilities.Description: At the end of each turn, its Sp. Atk is lowered. Then, you choose to raise its Speed or heal it for 1/5th HP.

XURKITREE.Pokedex: Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

CELESTEELA.Name: Celesteela

Abilities.Name: Auto-Pilot
Abilities.Description: At the beginning of every 5th turn, the Pokémon forcibly switches into battle. It chooses which move it will use that turn.

CELESTEELA.Pokedex: One of the dangerous UBs, high energy readings can be detected coming from both of its huge arms.

KARTANA.Name: Kartana

Abilities.Name: Noble Blade
Abilities.Description: Deals no damage to a target while they are using a status move.

KARTANA.Pokedex: This Ultra Beast's body, which is as thin as paper, is like a sharpened sword.

GUZZLORD.Name: Guzzlord

Abilities.Name: All-Consuming
Abilities.Description: When another Pokémon faints, consumes their item, ability, and stat steps.

GUZZLORD.Pokedex: Although it's alien to this world and a danger here, it's apparently a common organism in the world where it normally lives.

NECROZMA.Name: Necrozma

Abilities.Name: Prism Armor
Abilities.Description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks.

NECROZMA.Pokedex: It looks somehow pained as it rages around in search of light, which serves as its energy. It's apparently from another world.

MAGEARNA.Name: Magearna

Abilities.Name: Soul-Heart
Abilities.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk each time a Pokémon faints.

MAGEARNA.Pokedex: It synchronizes its consciousness with others to understand their feelings. This faculty makes it useful for taking care of people.

MARSHADOW.Name: Marshadow

Abilities.Name: Impressionable
Abilities.Description: Its same-type attack bonus is based on its party members rather than itself.

MARSHADOW.Pokedex: It slips into the shadows of others and mimics their powers and movements. As it improves, it becomes stronger than those it's imitating.

POIPOLE.Name: Poipole

Abilities.Name: Inexorable
Abilities.Description: Pokémon take damage from status conditions even while switched out.

POIPOLE.Pokedex: This Ultra Beast is well enough liked to be chosen as a first partner in its own world.

NAGANADEL.Name: Naganadel

Abilities.Name: Inexorable
Abilities.Description: Pokémon take damage from status conditions even while switched out.

NAGANADEL.Pokedex: It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid inside its body. It is one of the organisms known as UBs.

STAKATAKA.Name: Stakataka

Abilities.Name: Auto-Structure
Abilities.Description: At the end of every turn, its stats shift position (Attack-> Defense -> Sp. Atk -> Sp. Def -> Speed -> Attack...)

STAKATAKA.Pokedex: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.

BLACEPHALON.Name: Blacephalon

Abilities.Name: Fire Festival
Abilities.Description: At the end of every turn, each Pokémon takes 1/8th HP damage. This is treated as Fire-type.

BLACEPHALON.Pokedex: It slithers toward people. Then, without warning, it triggers the explosion of its own head. It's apparently one kind of Ultra Beast.

ZERAORA.Name: Zeraora

Abilities.Name: Hybrid Fighter
Abilities.Description: Punches, Kicks, and Bites combo together to create special effects.

ZERAORA.Pokedex: It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack, they'll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.

MELTAN.Name: Meltan

Abilities.Name: Iron Fist
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Full Metal Body
Abilities.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

MELTAN.Pokedex: It melts particles of iron and other metals found in the subsoil, so it can absorb them into its body of molten steel.

MELMETAL.Name: Melmetal

Abilities.Name: Iron Fist
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Full Metal Body
Abilities.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

MELMETAL.Pokedex: Revered long ago for its capacity to create iron from nothing, for some reason it has come back to life after 3,000 years.

GROOKEY.Name: Grookey

Abilities.Name: Verdant
Abilities.Description: Powers up Grass-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Vital Rhythm
Abilities.Description: At the end of each turn, itself and each ally heals for 1/16th of their HP.

GROOKEY.Pokedex: It attacks with rapid beats of its stick. As it strikes with amazing speed, it gets more and more pumped.

THWACKEY.Name: Thwackey

Abilities.Name: Verdant
Abilities.Description: Powers up Grass-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Vital Rhythm
Abilities.Description: At the end of each turn, itself and each ally heals for 1/16th of their HP.

THWACKEY.Pokedex: When it's drumming out rapid beats in battle, it gets so caught up in the rhythm that it won't even notice that it's already knocked out its opponent.

RILLABOOM.Name: Rillaboom

Abilities.Name: Verdant
Abilities.Description: Powers up Grass-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Vital Rhythm
Abilities.Description: At the end of each turn, itself and each ally heals for 1/16th of their HP.

RILLABOOM.Pokedex: By drumming, it taps into the power of its special tree stump. The roots of the stump follow its direction in battle.

SCORBUNNY.Name: Scorbunny

Abilities.Name: Freestyle
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon changes type to that of the move it's about to use. However, it's 20% less accurate.

Abilities.Name: Energetic
Abilities.Description: Can't be numbed, poisoned, or have its Speed reduced.

SCORBUNNY.Pokedex: It has special pads on the backs of its feet, and one on its nose. Once it's raring to fight, these pads radiate tremendous heat.

RABOOT.Name: Raboot

Abilities.Name: Freestyle
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon changes type to that of the move it's about to use. However, it's 20% less accurate.

Abilities.Name: Energetic
Abilities.Description: Can't be numbed, poisoned, or have its Speed reduced.

RABOOT.Pokedex: It kicks berries right off the branches of trees and then juggles them with its feet, practicing its footwork.

CINDERACE.Name: Cinderace

Abilities.Name: Freestyle
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon changes type to that of the move it's about to use. However, it's 20% less accurate.

Abilities.Name: Energetic
Abilities.Description: Can't be numbed, poisoned, or have its Speed reduced.

CINDERACE.Pokedex: It's skilled at both offense and defense, and it gets pumped up when cheered on. But if it starts showboating, it could put itself in a tough spot.

SOBBLE.Name: Sobble

Abilities.Name: Sniper
Abilities.Description: Doubles critical hit chance. Powers up critical hits by another 50%.

Abilities.Name: Illusion
Abilities.Description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

SOBBLE.Pokedex: When it gets wet, its skin changes color, and this Pokemon becomes invisible as if it were camouflaged.

DRIZZILE.Name: Drizzile

Abilities.Name: Sniper
Abilities.Description: Doubles critical hit chance. Powers up critical hits by another 50%.

Abilities.Name: Illusion
Abilities.Description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

DRIZZILE.Pokedex: Highly intelligent but also very lazy, it keeps enemies out of its territory by laying traps everywhere.

INTELEON.Name: Inteleon

Abilities.Name: Sniper
Abilities.Description: Doubles critical hit chance. Powers up critical hits by another 50%.

Abilities.Name: Illusion
Abilities.Description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

INTELEON.Pokedex: Its nictitating membranes let it pick out foes' weak points so it can precisely blast them with water that shoots from its fingertips at Mach 3.

SKWOVET.Name: Skwovet

Abilities.Name: Cheek Pouch
Abilities.Description: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it restores 33% of its max health.

Abilities.Name: Unaware
Abilities.Description: Ignores defensive stat changes in opponents it's hitting, and offensive stat stages in foes hitting it.

SKWOVET.Pokedex: It eats berries nonstop, a habit that has made it more resilient than it looks. It'll show up on farms, searching for yet more berries.

GREEDENT.Name: Greedent

Abilities.Name: Cheek Pouch
Abilities.Description: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it restores 33% of its max health.

Abilities.Name: Unaware
Abilities.Description: Ignores defensive stat changes in opponents it's hitting, and offensive stat stages in foes hitting it.

GREEDENT.Pokedex: Common throughout the Galar region, this Pokémon has strong teeth and can chew through the toughest of berry shells.

ROOKIDEE.Name: Rookidee

Abilities.Name: Mirror Armor
Abilities.Description: Bounces back stat-lowering effects.

Abilities.Name: Expertise
Abilities.Description: Powers up super-effective moves by 30%.

ROOKIDEE.Pokedex: Jumping nimbly about, this small-bodied Pokémon takes advantage of even the slightest opportunity to disorient larger opponents.

CORVISQUIRE.Name: Corvisquire

Abilities.Name: Mirror Armor
Abilities.Description: Bounces back stat-lowering effects.

Abilities.Name: Expertise
Abilities.Description: Powers up super-effective moves by 30%.

CORVISQUIRE.Pokedex: The lessons of many harsh battles have taught it how to accurately judge an opponent's strength.

CORVIKNIGHT.Name: Corviknight

Abilities.Name: Mirror Armor
Abilities.Description: Bounces back stat-lowering effects.

Abilities.Name: Expertise
Abilities.Description: Powers up super-effective moves by 30%.

CORVIKNIGHT.Pokedex: With their great intellect and flying skills, these Pokémon very successfully act as the Galar region's airborne taxi service.

BLIPBUG.Name: Blipbug

Abilities.Name: Brain Scramble
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to dizzy targets when using special moves.

Abilities.Name: Master Plan
Abilities.Description: Raises each stat by two steps when a Total Eclipse happens.

BLIPBUG.Pokedex: Often found in gardens, this Pokémon has hairs on its body that it uses to assess its surroundings.

DOTTLER.Name: Dottler

Abilities.Name: Brain Scramble
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to dizzy targets when using special moves.

Abilities.Name: Master Plan
Abilities.Description: Raises each stat by two steps when a Total Eclipse happens.

DOTTLER.Pokedex: As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic abilities to monitor the outside world and prepare for evolution.

ORBEETLE.Name: Orbeetle

Abilities.Name: Brain Scramble
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to dizzy targets when using special moves.

Abilities.Name: Master Plan
Abilities.Description: Raises each stat by two steps when a Total Eclipse happens.

ORBEETLE.Pokedex: It emits psychic energy to observe and study what's around it, and what's around it can include things over six miles away.

NICKIT.Name: Nickit

Abilities.Name: Moonlighter
Abilities.Description: When hit in moonglow, steals the attacker's item, or knocks it away.

Abilities.Name: Sentry
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage while using a status move.

NICKIT.Pokedex: Cunning and cautious, this Pokémon survives by stealing food from others. It erases its tracks with swipes of its tail as it makes off with its plunder.

THIEVUL.Name: Thievul

Abilities.Name: Moonlighter
Abilities.Description: When hit in moonglow, steals the attacker's item, or knocks it away.

Abilities.Name: Sentry
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage while using a status move.

THIEVUL.Pokedex: With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes around stealing food and eggs. Boltund is its natural enemy.

GOSSIFLEUR.Name: Gossifleur

Abilities.Name: Cotton Down
Abilities.Description: Lowers everyone else's Speed by two steps when hit by an attack.

Abilities.Name: On the Wind
Abilities.Description: Sets a Tailwind for four turns upon entering the battle, increasing Speed.

GOSSIFLEUR.Pokedex: It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous song. This delightful display has charmed many into raising this Pokémon.

ELDEGOSS.Name: Eldegoss

Abilities.Name: Cotton Down
Abilities.Description: Lowers everyone else's Speed by two steps when hit by an attack.

Abilities.Name: On the Wind
Abilities.Description: Sets a Tailwind for four turns upon entering the battle, increasing Speed.

ELDEGOSS.Pokedex: The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn, a Galar regional specialty.

WOOLOO.Name: Wooloo

Abilities.Name: Fluffy
Abilities.Description: Doubles Defense. The Pokémon takes double damage from Fire-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Cold Reception
Abilities.Description: Immune to Ice-type moves, and raises both attacking stats if hit by one.

WOOLOO.Pokedex: If its fleece grows too long, Wooloo won't be able to move. Cloth made with the wool of this Pokémon is surprisingly strong.

DUBWOOL.Name: Dubwool

Abilities.Name: Fluffy
Abilities.Description: Doubles Defense. The Pokémon takes double damage from Fire-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Cold Reception
Abilities.Description: Immune to Ice-type moves, and raises both attacking stats if hit by one.

DUBWOOL.Pokedex: Its majestic horns are meant only to impress the opposite gender. They never see use in battle.

CHEWTLE.Name: Chewtle

Abilities.Name: Strong Jaw
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of biting moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Trapper
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage from Pokémon that are trapped.

CHEWTLE.Pokedex: It starts off battles by attacking with its rock-hard horn, but as soon as the opponent flinches, this Pokémon bites down and never lets go.

DREDNAW.Name: Drednaw

Abilities.Name: Strong Jaw
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of biting moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Trapper
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage from Pokémon that are trapped.

DREDNAW.Pokedex: This Pokémon rapidly extends its retractable neck to sink its sharp fangs into distant enemies and take them down.

YAMPER.Name: Yamper

Abilities.Name: Strong Jaw
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of biting moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Strikes Twice
Abilities.Description: In rain, each of its hits is followed by an extra hit at 25% power.

YAMPER.Pokedex: This gluttonous Pokémon only assists people with their work because it wants treats. As it runs, it crackles with electricity.

BOLTUND.Name: Boltund

Abilities.Name: Strong Jaw
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of biting moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Strikes Twice
Abilities.Description: In rain, each of its hits is followed by an extra hit at 25% power.

BOLTUND.Pokedex: It sends electricity through its legs to boost their strength. Running at top speed, it easily breaks 50 mph.

ROLYCOLY.Name: Rolycoly

Abilities.Name: Steam Power
Abilities.Description: Takes 50% less damage from Water-type moves. Raises Speed by four steps when hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Fuel Hungry
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 30%, but lowers Attack after using a physical move.

ROLYCOLY.Pokedex: It can race around like a unicycle, even on rough, rocky terrain. Burning coal sustains it.

CARKOL.Name: Carkol

Abilities.Name: Steam Power
Abilities.Description: Takes 50% less damage from Water-type moves. Raises Speed by four steps when hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Fuel Hungry
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 30%, but lowers Attack after using a physical move.

CARKOL.Pokedex: By rapidly rolling its legs, it can travel at over 18 mph. The temperature of the flames it breathes exceeds 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit.

COALOSSAL.Name: Coalossal

Abilities.Name: Steam Power
Abilities.Description: Takes 50% less damage from Water-type moves. Raises Speed by four steps when hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Fuel Hungry
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 30%, but lowers Attack after using a physical move.

COALOSSAL.Pokedex: While it's engaged in battle, its mountain of coal will burn bright red, sending off sparks that scorch the surrounding area.

APPLIN.Name: Applin

Abilities.Name: Gluttony
Abilities.Description: Eats pinch berries earlier than normal.

Abilities.Name: Shed Skin
Abilities.Description: Heals from burn, frostbite, poison, numb, or leech at end of turn.

APPLIN.Pokedex: As soon as it's born, it burrows into an apple. The apple serves as both a food source and a home.

FLAPPLE.Name: Flapple

Abilities.Name: Hustle
Abilities.Description: Boosts move damage by 50%, but lowers accuracy by 20%.

Abilities.Name: Shed Skin
Abilities.Description: Heals from burn, frostbite, poison, numb, or leech at end of turn.

FLAPPLE.Pokedex: It flies on wings of apple skin and spits a powerful acid. It can also change its shape into that of an apple.

APPLETUN.Name: Appletun

Abilities.Name: Ripen
Abilities.Description: Ripens Berries and doubles their effect.

Abilities.Name: Firefighter
Abilities.Description: Immune to Fire-type moves, and raises both attacking stats if hit by one.

APPLETUN.Pokedex: A nectarous scent wafts from its body, luring in the bug Pokémon it preys on. The skin on its back is especially yummy.

SILICOBRA.Name: Silicobra

Abilities.Name: Sand Sniper
Abilities.Description: Boosts Speed by 50% in sand. Can't miss during sandstorm.

Abilities.Name: Disorienting
Abilities.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to dizzy the attacker.

SILICOBRA.Pokedex: It spews sand from its nostrils. While the enemy is blinded, it burrows into the ground to hide.

SANDACONDA.Name: Sandaconda

Abilities.Name: Sand Sniper
Abilities.Description: Boosts Speed by 50% in sand. Can't miss during sandstorm.

Abilities.Name: Disorienting
Abilities.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to dizzy the attacker.

SANDACONDA.Pokedex: Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand out of its sand sac more efficiently.

CRAMORANT.Name: Cramorant

Abilities.Name: Gulp Missile
Abilities.Description: Attacks with prey caught when using Surf, Dive, or Depth Charge.

CRAMORANT.Pokedex: This hungry Pokémon swallows Arrokuda whole. Occasionally, it makes a mistake and tries to swallow a Pokémon other than its preferred prey.

ARROKUDA.Name: Arrokuda

Abilities.Name: Follow Through
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by two steps after knocking out any Pokémon.

Abilities.Name: Straight Ahead
Abilities.Description: Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves. Its attacks can't be redirected to new targets.

ARROKUDA.Pokedex: After it's eaten its fill, its movements become extremely sluggish. That's when Cramorant swallows it up.

BARRASKEWDA.Name: Barraskewda

Abilities.Name: Follow Through
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by two steps after knocking out any Pokémon.

Abilities.Name: Straight Ahead
Abilities.Description: Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves. Its attacks can't be redirected to new targets.

BARRASKEWDA.Pokedex: It spins its tail fins to propel itself, surging forward at speeds of over 100 knots before ramming prey and spearing into them.

TOXEL.Name: Toxel

Abilities.Name: Loud
Abilities.Description: Boosts power of sound-based moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Thunderstruck
Abilities.Description: Becomes charged when hit by an attack, doubling the power of its next Electric-type attack.

TOXEL.Pokedex: It manipulates the chemical makeup of its poison to produce electricity. The voltage is weak, but it can cause a tingling paralysis.

TOXTRICITY.Name: Toxtricity

Abilities.Name: Loud
Abilities.Description: Boosts power of sound-based moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Thunderstruck
Abilities.Description: Becomes charged when hit by an attack, doubling the power of its next Electric-type attack.

TOXTRICITY.Pokedex: This short-tempered and aggressive Pokémon chugs stagnant water to absorb any toxins it might contain.

SIZZLIPEDE.Name: Sizzlipede

Abilities.Name: Firefighter
Abilities.Description: Immune to Fire-type moves, and raises both attacking stats if hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Exotherm Engine
Abilities.Description: Boosts Speed by 50% but the user is locked into the first move they use.

SIZZLIPEDE.Pokedex: It wraps prey up with its heated body, cooking them in its coils. Once they're well-done, it will voraciously nibble them down to the last morsel.

CENTISKORCH.Name: Centiskorch

Abilities.Name: Firefighter
Abilities.Description: Immune to Fire-type moves, and raises both attacking stats if hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Exotherm Engine
Abilities.Description: Boosts Speed by 50% but the user is locked into the first move they use.

CENTISKORCH.Pokedex: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.

CLOBBOPUS.Name: Clobbopus

Abilities.Name: Numbing Touch
Abilities.Description: Physical moves have a 30% chance to numb targets.

Abilities.Name: Technician
Abilities.Description: Moves with base power 60 or less deal 50% more damage.

CLOBBOPUS.Pokedex: Its tentacles tear off easily, but it isn't alarmed when that happens, it knows they'll grow back. It's about as smart as a three-year-old.

GRAPPLOCT.Name: Grapploct

Abilities.Name: Numbing Touch
Abilities.Description: Physical moves have a 30% chance to numb targets.

Abilities.Name: Technician
Abilities.Description: Moves with base power 60 or less deal 50% more damage.

GRAPPLOCT.Pokedex: Searching for an opponent to test its skills against, it emerges onto land. Once the battle is over, it returns to the sea.

SINISTEA.Name: Sinistea

Abilities.Name: Frostpitality
Abilities.Description: Prevents the foe from escaping during hail.

Abilities.Name: Burn Skill
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to burn targets when using special moves.

SINISTEA.Pokedex: The teacup in which this Pokémon makes its home is a famous piece of antique tableware. Many forgeries are in circulation.

POLTEAGEIST.Name: Polteageist

Abilities.Name: Frostpitality
Abilities.Description: Prevents the foe from escaping during hail.

Abilities.Name: Burn Skill
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to burn targets when using special moves.

POLTEAGEIST.Pokedex: Leaving leftover black tea unattended is asking for this Pokémon to come along and pour itself into it, turning the tea into a new Polteageist.

HATENNA.Name: Hatenna

Abilities.Name: Killjoy
Abilities.Description: Pokémon can't dance or use sound-based moves.

Abilities.Name: Sleetshaker
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 30% in hailstorms.

HATENNA.Pokedex: If this Pokémon senses a strong emotion, it will run away as fast as it can. It prefers areas without people.

HATTREM.Name: Hattrem

Abilities.Name: Killjoy
Abilities.Description: Pokémon can't dance or use sound-based moves.

Abilities.Name: Sleetshaker
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 30% in hailstorms.

HATTREM.Pokedex: Using the braids on its head, it pummels foes to get them to quiet down. One blow from those braids would knock out a professional boxer.

HATTERENE.Name: Hatterene

Abilities.Name: Killjoy
Abilities.Description: Pokémon can't dance or use sound-based moves.

Abilities.Name: Sleetshaker
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 30% in hailstorms.

HATTERENE.Pokedex: If you're too loud around it, you risk being torn apart by the claws on its tentacle. This Pokémon is also known as the Forest Witch.

IMPIDIMP.Name: Impidimp

Abilities.Name: Unassuming
Abilities.Description: Before using a status move against a single foe, lowers their Defense by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Ruinous
Abilities.Description: All Pokémon deal 40% more move damage.

IMPIDIMP.Pokedex: It sneaks into people's homes, stealing things and feasting on the negative energy of the frustrated occupants.

MORGREM.Name: Morgrem

Abilities.Name: Unassuming
Abilities.Description: Before using a status move against a single foe, lowers their Defense by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Ruinous
Abilities.Description: All Pokémon deal 40% more move damage.

MORGREM.Pokedex: With sly cunning, it tries to lure people into the woods. Some believe it to have the power to make crops grow.

GRIMMSNARL.Name: Grimmsnarl

Abilities.Name: Unassuming
