Abilities.Description: Before using a status move against a single foe, lowers their Defense by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Ruinous
Abilities.Description: All Pokémon deal 40% more move damage.

GRIMMSNARL.Pokedex: Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.

OBSTAGOON.Name: Obstagoon

Abilities.Name: Hooligan
Abilities.Description: Powers up recoil and sound moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

OBSTAGOON.Pokedex: It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.

PERRSERKER.Name: Perrserker

Abilities.Name: Slush Rush
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

Abilities.Name: Steely Spirit
Abilities.Description: Powers up Steel-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.

PERRSERKER.Pokedex: After many battles, it evolved dangerous claws that come together to form daggers when extended.

CURSOLA.Name: Cursola

Abilities.Name: Ecto-Particles
Abilities.Description: Restores HP based on damage from hail.

Abilities.Name: Perish Body
Abilities.Description: When it takes a hit, both Pokémon faint after 3 turns.

CURSOLA.Pokedex: Be cautious of the ectoplasmic body surrounding its soul. You'll become stiff as stone if you touch it.

SIRFETCHD.Name: Sirfetch'd

Abilities.Name: Break Through
Abilities.Description: Moves ignore immunities due to typing.

Abilities.Name: Super Luck
Abilities.Description: Four times more likely for moves to be critical.

SIRFETCHD.Pokedex: After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield, it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek stalk is both weapon and food.

MRRIME.Name: Mr. Rime

Abilities.Name: Slapstick
Abilities.Description: Whenever a foe fails or misses, they take 1/8th HP damage.

Abilities.Name: Screen Cleaner
Abilities.Description: Screens are nullified when entering battle.

MRRIME.Pokedex: Its amusing movements make it very popular. It releases its psychic power from the pattern on its belly.

RUNERIGUS.Name: Runerigus

Abilities.Name: Wandering Spirit
Abilities.Description: Taking a physical hit exchanges Abilities.

Abilities.Name: Sand Stream
Abilities.Description: Summons a sandstorm for 4 turns when it enters battle.

RUNERIGUS.Pokedex: Never touch its shadowlike body, or you'll be shown the horrific memories behind the picture carved into it.

MILCERY.Name: Milcery

Abilities.Name: Tantalizing
Abilities.Description: Draws in attacks from enemies with below half health.

Abilities.Name: Hubris
Abilities.Description: Raises Sp. Atk after knocking out any Pokémon.

MILCERY.Pokedex: They say that any patisserie visited by Milcery is guaranteed success and good fortune.

ALCREMIE.Name: Alcremie

Abilities.Name: Tantalizing
Abilities.Description: Draws in attacks from enemies with below half health.

Abilities.Name: Hubris
Abilities.Description: Raises Sp. Atk after knocking out any Pokémon.

ALCREMIE.Pokedex: When Alcremie is content, the cream it secretes from its hands becomes sweeter and richer.

FALINKS.Name: Falinks

Abilities.Name: Imperious
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

Abilities.Name: Armor Piercing
Abilities.Description: Deals double damage against Pokémon that have raised defenses or that are protected by a screen.

FALINKS.Pokedex: The six of them work together as one Pokémon. Teamwork is also their battle strategy, and they constantly change their formation as they fight.

PINCURCHIN.Name: Pincurchin

Abilities.Name: Arc Conductor
Abilities.Description: Inflicts 1/6th max HP damage to the foe when damaged during rain.

Abilities.Name: Spinesplode
Abilities.Description: Leaves two layers of spikes after it self-destructs.

PINCURCHIN.Pokedex: It stores electricity in each spine. Even if one gets broken off, it still continues to emit electricity for at least three hours.

SNOM.Name: Snom

Abilities.Name: Ice Scales
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Sp. Def.

Abilities.Name: Adapted
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves of the same type by 33%.

SNOM.Pokedex: It eats snow that piles up on the ground. The more snow it eats, the bigger and more impressive the spikes on its back grow.

FROSMOTH.Name: Frosmoth

Abilities.Name: Ice Scales
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Sp. Def.

Abilities.Name: Adapted
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves of the same type by 33%.

FROSMOTH.Pokedex: It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings, causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.

STONJOURNER.Name: Stonjourner

Abilities.Name: Power Spot
Abilities.Description: Powers up nearby allies moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Berserk
Abilities.Description: Raises Atk and Sp. Atk by two steps each when its HP is lowered below half.

STONJOURNER.Pokedex: Once a year, on a specific date and at a specific time, they gather out of nowhere and form up in a circle.

EISCUE.Name: Eiscue

Abilities.Name: Ice Block
Abilities.Description: It can avoid being knocked out by using its face. The face then melts.

EISCUE.Pokedex: This Pokémon keeps its heat-sensitive head cool with ice. It fishes for its food, dangling its single hair into the sea to lure in prey.

INDEEDEE.Name: Indeedee

Abilities.Name: Assistant
Abilities.Description: Uses Assist upon entry, copying a random team-mates move.

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

INDEEDEE.Pokedex: Through its horns, it can pick up on the emotions of creatures around it. Positive emotions are the source of its strength.

MORPEKO.Name: Morpeko

Abilities.Name: Hunger Switch
Abilities.Description: It alternates between an Electric-type Mode and a Dark-type Mode.

MORPEKO.Pokedex: It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if they're precious treasures. No matter how much it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.

CUFANT.Name: Cufant

Abilities.Name: Heavy Metal
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

CUFANT.Pokedex: If a job requires serious strength, this Pokémon will excel at it. Its copper body tarnishes in the rain, turning a vibrant green color.

COPPERAJAH.Name: Copperajah

Abilities.Name: Heavy Metal
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

COPPERAJAH.Pokedex: These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush giant rocks into powder.

DRACOZOLT.Name: Dracozolt

Abilities.Name: Foolhardy
Abilities.Description: Immune to Psychic-type moves, and boosts Speed when hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Challenger
Abilities.Description: Immune to Fighting-type moves, and boosts Speed when hit by one.

DRACOZOLT.Pokedex: The powerful muscles in its tail generate its electricity. Compared to its lower body, its upper half is entirely too small.

ARCTOZOLT.Name: Arctozolt

Abilities.Name: Meteoric
Abilities.Description: Boosts Speed by 50% in sandstorm or hail.

Abilities.Name: Adrenaline Rush
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by four steps when its HP is lowered below half.

ARCTOZOLT.Pokedex: This Pokémon lived on prehistoric seashores and was able to preserve food with the ice on its body. It went extinct because it moved so slowly.

DRACOVISH.Name: Dracovish

Abilities.Name: Live Fast
Abilities.Description: Boosts Speed by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

Abilities.Name: Schadenfreude
Abilities.Description: Restores 1/4th health after any foe faints.

DRACOVISH.Pokedex: Its mighty legs are capable of running at speeds exceeding 40 mph, but this Pokémon can't breathe unless it's underwater.

ARCTOVISH.Name: Arctovish

Abilities.Name: Burdened
Abilities.Description: Receives 33% less move damage, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

Abilities.Name: Analytic
Abilities.Description: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last by 30%.

ARCTOVISH.Pokedex: The skin on its face is impervious to attack, but breathing difficulties made this Pokémon go extinct anyway.

DURALUDON.Name: Duraludon

Abilities.Name: Stubborn
Abilities.Description: Prevents its stats from being lowered by more than 1 step at a time.

Abilities.Name: High-rise
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon and its allies are immune to weather downsides.

DURALUDON.Pokedex: The special metal that composes its body is very light, so this Pokémon has considerable agility. It lives in caves because it dislikes the rain.

DREEPY.Name: Dreepy

Abilities.Name: Clear Body
Abilities.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

Abilities.Name: Infiltrator
Abilities.Description: Ignores screens and other barriers, Substitute, and boosted defensive stats.

DREEPY.Pokedex: If this weak Pokémon is by itself, a mere child could defeat it. But if Dreepy has friends to help it train, it can evolve and become much stronger.

DRAKLOAK.Name: Drakloak

Abilities.Name: Clear Body
Abilities.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

Abilities.Name: Infiltrator
Abilities.Description: Ignores screens and other barriers, Substitute, and boosted defensive stats.

DRAKLOAK.Pokedex: Without a Dreepy to place on its head and care for, it gets so uneasy it'll try to substitute any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.

DRAGAPULT.Name: Dragapult

Abilities.Name: Clear Body
Abilities.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

Abilities.Name: Infiltrator
Abilities.Description: Ignores screens and other barriers, Substitute, and boosted defensive stats.

DRAGAPULT.Pokedex: Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult's horns eagerly look forward to being launched out at Mach speeds.

ZACIAN.Name: Zacian

Abilities.Name: Intrepid Sword
Abilities.Description: Raises Attack when the Pokémon enters a battle.

ZACIAN.Pokedex: This Pokémon has slumbered for many years. Some say it's Zamazenta's elder sister, others say the two Pokémon are rivals.

ZAMAZENTA.Name: Zamazenta

Abilities.Name: Dauntless Shield
Abilities.Description: Raises Defense when the Pokémon enters a battle.

ZAMAZENTA.Pokedex: This Pokémon slept for aeons while in the form of a statue. It was asleep for so long, people forgot that it ever existed.

ETERNATUS.Name: Eternatus

Abilities.Name: Pressure
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.

ETERNATUS.Pokedex: It was inside a meteorite that fell 20,000 years ago. There seems to be a connection between this Pokémon and the Dynamax phenomenon.

KUBFU.Name: Kubfu

Abilities.Name: Inner Focus
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.

KUBFU.Pokedex: If Kubfu pulls the long white hair on its head, its fighting spirit heightens and power wells up from the depths of its belly.

URSHIFU.Name: Urshifu

Abilities.Name: Unseen Fist
Abilities.Description: Physical moves negate all protection effects.

URSHIFU.Pokedex: Inhabiting the mountains of a distant region, this Pokémon races across sheer cliffs, training its legs and refining its moves.

ZARUDE.Name: Zarude

Abilities.Name: Leaf Guard
Abilities.Description: Immune to status conditions while in sunshine.

ZARUDE.Pokedex: Once the vines on Zarude's body tear off, they become nutrients in the soil. This helps the plants of the forest grow.

REGIELEKI.Name: Regieleki

Abilities.Name: Transistor
Abilities.Description: Powers up Electric-type moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Gauss Aftershock
Abilities.Description: Pokémon that swap in for this have their Speed raised and their PP fully restored.

REGIELEKI.Pokedex: The fifth of the titans, built to commemorate an era of electricity. It is as inscrutable as a cutting-edge supercomputer.

REGIDRAGO.Name: Regidrago

Abilities.Name: Dragon's Maw
Abilities.Description: Powers up Dragon-type moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Dragon's Blood
Abilities.Description: Reduces the damage of each hit against it by an amount equal to its level.

REGIDRAGO.Pokedex: The first of the titans, built to commemorate an era when dragons ruled. It is as terrifying as an apex predator.

GLASTRIER.Name: Glastrier

Abilities.Name: Chilling Neigh
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.

GLASTRIER.Pokedex: Glastrier has tremendous physical strength, and the mask of ice covering its face is 100 times harder than diamond.

SPECTRIER.Name: Spectrier

Abilities.Name: Grim Neigh
Abilities.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk after knocking out any Pokémon.

SPECTRIER.Pokedex: As it dashes through the night, Spectrier absorbs the life-force of sleeping creatures. It craves silence and solitude.

CALYREX.Name: Calyrex

Abilities.Name: Unnerve
Abilities.Description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries or Leftovers.

CALYREX.Pokedex: Legend says that by using its power to see all events from past to future, this Pokémon saved the creatures of a forest from a meteorite strike.

WORNET.Name: Wornet

Abilities.Name: Deep Sting
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 50%, but physical moves deal 25% damage back as recoil.

Abilities.Name: Predation
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to leech targets when using physical moves.

WORNET.Pokedex: Its final evolution has sent its killer instinct into overdrive. It obeys its trainer unfailingly, but will grow impatient without a good fight.

PAPELLUMEN.Name: Papellumen

Abilities.Name: Fae Veil
Abilities.Description: Prevents itself and allies from being burned, frostbitten, or numbed.

Abilities.Name: Erudite
Abilities.Description: Powers up Psychic-type moves by 50%.

PAPELLUMEN.Pokedex: Evolutionary power has supercharged its wings and their toxic scales, which turn to pure energy at the slightest provocation.

TEAMUJIN.Name: Teamujin

Abilities.Name: Parental Bond
Abilities.Description: Child attacks after the parent, for 25% of the previous damage.

TEAMUJIN.Pokedex: Mother and daughter fight alongside each other, delivering blows in quick succession. Their battle bond is unbreakable.

HOUNDOMINUS.Name: Houndominus

Abilities.Name: Midnight Sun
Abilities.Description: Powers up Dark-type moves by 50% in sunshine.

Abilities.Name: Berserk
Abilities.Description: Raises Atk and Sp. Atk by two steps each when its HP is lowered below half.

HOUNDOMINUS.Pokedex: They are the steeds of the Elite Four of the Apocalypse, and their howls will ring in the end of days... or so the stories go.

RUBARIOR.Name: Rubarior

Abilities.Name: Magic Shield
Abilities.Description: Negates enemy status moves that target the Pokémon or create hazards around it.

Abilities.Name: Prankster
Abilities.Description: Gives priority to status moves, but makes Dark-types immune to them.

RUBARIOR.Pokedex: Attackers find their weaknesses and regrets reflected in the jewel Rubarior carries. If it feels unloved, it will make its Trainer cry.

DECEAT.Name: Deceat

Abilities.Name: Pure Force
Abilities.Description: Raises the Pokémon's Attack by 50%, including Style Values and other bonuses.

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

DECEAT.Pokedex: Fans argue whether it's the cutest terrifying Pokémon or the creepiest cute Pokémon. It will act cute or scary depending on its trainer's whims.

PALMANTRA.Name: Palmantra

Abilities.Name: Middle Way
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 50% if it used a special move last turn, or boosts Sp. Atk if physical.

Abilities.Name: Stability
Abilities.Description: Can't be poisoned, burned, or frostbitten.

PALMANTRA.Pokedex: This Pokémon can go up to four years without eating a single meal. Through intense training, it is able to fight in a manner indistinguishable from a dance.

MANERGETIC.Name: Manergetic

Abilities.Name: Nerve Number
Abilities.Description: Special moves have a 30% chance to numb targets.

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

MANERGETIC.Pokedex: If not calmed during storms, it will cause havoc by trying to race lightning bolts.

SCARODON.Name: Scarodon

Abilities.Name: Schadenfreude
Abilities.Description: Restores 1/4th health after any foe faints.

Abilities.Name: Marine Menace
Abilities.Description: Dive and Depth Charge deal 50% more damage.

SCARODON.Pokedex: Its propulsion system is the basis for many ramjet engine designs. It eats four times its body weight in food before a battle and will still be hungry by the end.

DROMERUPT.Name: Dromerupt

Abilities.Name: Unfazed
Abilities.Description: Takes 20% less damage from neutrally effective attacks.

Abilities.Name: Adrenaline Rush
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by four steps when its HP is lowered below half.

DROMERUPT.Pokedex: Magma builds up in its body over time. If this Pokémon does not regularly erupt, it might accidentally destroy the area around it.

HYMNUS.Name: Hymnus

Abilities.Name: Levitate
Abilities.Description: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Rain Prism
Abilities.Description: Powers up Fairy-type moves by 50% in rain.

HYMNUS.Pokedex: This Pokémon's singing can bring even the most stoic Trainers to tears. Those who fall asleep on it are said to experience beautiful dreams.

MANIKLAW.Name: Maniklaw

Abilities.Name: Malice
Abilities.Description: If an attack lowers its HP to half or less, curses the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Razor's Edge
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of blade moves by 30%. They're twice as likely to crit.

MANIKLAW.Pokedex: Its pink claws and feet appear to be made of flesh, but are actually raw negative energy. When it is finally fully unzipped, it moves on to its next life.

ABSOLUS.Name: Absolus

Abilities.Name: Bad Omen
Abilities.Description: Foretold moves hit two turns quicker and deal 30% more damage.

Abilities.Name: Vengeance
Abilities.Description: After an attack reduces its HP to half or less, deals 1/4 of the attacker's HP back to the attacker.

ABSOLUS.Pokedex: It's loved for its elegantly intimidating looks. It may herald a coming cataclysm, but nothing gets between a trainer and a fashionable Pokémon.

HAEROBIC.Name: Haerobic

Abilities.Name: Unafraid
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dark- and Bug-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Stubborn
Abilities.Description: Prevents its stats from being lowered by more than 1 step at a time.

HAEROBIC.Pokedex: It patterns its fur and attacks after human fighters it looks up to. Only the most over-the-top action movies can inspire it to reach its true potential.

CONIFEAR.Name: Conifear

Abilities.Name: Frost Scatter
Abilities.Description: Summons a hailstorm for four turns when hit by an attack.

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

CONIFEAR.Pokedex: Blizzards follow it wherever it goes. It's often used as shelter by unsuspecting mountaineers, though it doesn't mind.

SENSIBELLE.Name: Sensibelle

Abilities.Name: Moon Blanket
Abilities.Description: User and allies take 25% less move damage during moonglow.

Abilities.Name: Regenerator
Abilities.Description: Restores 25% of max HP when withdrawn from battle.

SENSIBELLE.Pokedex: They are brought into hospitals when conventional medicine fails. They can hear the number of heartbeats a person has left, but will never tell.

SAHARICANE.Name: Saharicane

Abilities.Name: Sand Sniper
Abilities.Description: Boosts Speed by 50% in sand. Can't miss during sandstorm.

Abilities.Name: Disorienting
Abilities.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to dizzy the attacker.

SAHARICANE.Pokedex: Its rough belly scales can pulverize entire quarries for sand to use in battle. Its fights with Flygon in the center of desert storms are the stuff of legend.

KLAWSAR.Name: Klawsar

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Steely Shell
Abilities.Description: Steel-type attacks deal 50% more damage, and the Pokemon is protected from critical hits.

KLAWSAR.Pokedex: Its claw has become so large that if it finds itself unable to clamp its opponent, it will just smack them with the blunt side.

SEISMAW.Name: Seismaw

Abilities.Name: Strong Jaw
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of biting moves by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Trapper
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage from Pokémon that are trapped.

SEISMAW.Pokedex: It balances itself like a sumo wrestler, making it nearly impossible to topple. Its squishy flesh is even more resilent than its shell.

ARCLAMOR.Name: Arclamor

Abilities.Name: Loud
Abilities.Description: Boosts power of sound-based moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Thunderstruck
Abilities.Description: Becomes charged when hit by an attack, doubling the power of its next Electric-type attack.

ARCLAMOR.Pokedex: It subconsciously broadcasts the audio of its battles over radio waves. Tuning in at the right time will let you hear the performance of a lifetime.

BLASFEMMIE.Name: Blasfemmie

Abilities.Name: Tantalizing
Abilities.Description: Draws in attacks from enemies with below half health.

Abilities.Name: Hubris
Abilities.Description: Raises Sp. Atk after knocking out any Pokémon.

BLASFEMMIE.Pokedex: So tall it seems to defy the heavens, it lords its elevated position over other Pokémon. It grants its Trainer knowledge of sweet and sour.

SCARAPACE.Name: Scarapace

Abilities.Name: Victory Molt
Abilities.Description: Heals status conditions and resets stat changes after knocking out any Pokémon.

Abilities.Name: Juggernaut
Abilities.Description: Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves or activate after hitting the target.

SCARAPACE.Pokedex: When the buzz of its wings becomes a roar, it's about to bolt at full speed. It isn't uncommon for its charges to send opponents through buildings.

ATLACROSS.Name: Atlacross

Abilities.Name: Skill Link
Abilities.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves.

Abilities.Name: Power Lifter
Abilities.Description: Its physical attacks go last but force the target to switch out after use.

ATLACROSS.Pokedex: They can be seen watching the sky, trying to find a place to stand for when they inevitably attempt to deadlift the world.

SAURENAID.Name: Saurenaid

Abilities.Name: Arctic Ariette
Abilities.Description: Sound-based attacks turn Ice-type and are boosted by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Leviathan
Abilities.Description: Protected from critical hits. Can't be burned or frostbitten.

SAURENAID.Pokedex: The musical staff around its body is made of ice particles. The symbols are indecipherable, but some say they've heard Saurenaid speak its own language.

DONSTER.Name: Donster

Abilities.Name: Aggravate
Abilities.Description: HP-fraction-based damage effects deal 50% more damage to opponents.

Abilities.Name: Vengeance
Abilities.Description: After an attack reduces its HP to half or less, deals 1/4 of the attacker's HP back to the attacker.

DONSTER.Pokedex: It's unclear what the objects embedded in its body are or where they came from. More must be added over time, though, as anything it absorbs is quickly dissolved.

NIBELONG.Name: Nibelong

Abilities.Name: Long Odds
Abilities.Description: Multi-hit moves can hit up to twice as many times.

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

NIBELONG.Pokedex: Scientists are divided as to whether its incredible length inspired internet memes, or whether seeing memes caused a Meowth to undergo unprecedented evolution.

GIGANTEON.Name: Giganteon

Abilities.Name: Ultra Adapted
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves of the same type by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Friend to All
Abilities.Description: Counts as every tribe.

GIGANTEON.Pokedex: Its fluffiness, friendliness, and massive size make it beloved by nearly everyone. Attackers don't know where to begin.

GIGACHU.Name: Gigachu

Abilities.Name: Arc Conductor
Abilities.Description: Inflicts 1/6th max HP damage to the foe when damaged during rain.

Abilities.Name: Gargantuan
Abilities.Description: Completely protects allies from foes' multi-target moves.

GIGACHU.Pokedex: Rarely, a Pikachu grows to incredible size instead of evolving into Raichu. It can power settlements so long as it's fed properly.

MILLIBLAZE.Name: Milliblaze

Abilities.Name: Firefighter
Abilities.Description: Immune to Fire-type moves, and raises both attacking stats if hit by one.

Abilities.Name: Exotherm Engine
Abilities.Description: Boosts Speed by 50% but the user is locked into the first move they use.

MILLIBLAZE.Pokedex: Even solid titanium will melt in its coils. It uses the massive mirage it creates to confuse Volcarona in their frequent contests.

RIOJIN.Name: Riojin

Abilities.Name: Honorable
Abilities.Description: Lowers priority of status moves used by any Pokémon.

Abilities.Name: Inner Focus
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.

RIOJIN.Pokedex: It fights in a state of complete clarity without mercy, fear, or stress. When it has achieved all its goals, it will simply cease to be.

TITANIX.Name: Titanix

Abilities.Name: Radiate
Abilities.Description: Increases Sp. Atk by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Gravitas
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, intensifies gravity for five turns.

TITANIX.Pokedex: Its crystalline parts resist all attempts to identify them. Titanix's gravitational abilities make some scientists speculate the crystals are neutron matter.

DIGNIPHITE.Name: Digniphite

Abilities.Name: Heavy Metal
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's weight.

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

DIGNIPHITE.Pokedex: After evolution, it has taken on the appearance of a great monument. If revered, it will protect nearby villages from all manner of disaster.

TOWERPODA.Name: Towerpoda

Abilities.Name: Stubborn
Abilities.Description: Prevents its stats from being lowered by more than 1 step at a time.

Abilities.Name: High-rise
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon and its allies are immune to weather downsides.

TOWERPODA.Pokedex: Nostalgic for the cavern home it has outgrown, it will weep molten glass. Those without trainers may find company serving as rookeries for bird Pokémon.

PTEROFLYTE.Name: Pteroflyte

Abilities.Name: Armor Piercing
Abilities.Description: Deals double damage against Pokémon that have raised defenses or that are protected by a screen.

Abilities.Name: Scoured Silhouette
Abilities.Description: Upon entry during sandstorm, lowers foe's Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps each.

PTEROFLYTE.Pokedex: In ancient times, this Pokemon was an apex predator. It has the strength to fly with a Tyrantrum in its claws.

REAVOR.Name: Reavor

Abilities.Name: Technician
Abilities.Description: Moves with base power 60 or less deal 50% more damage.

Abilities.Name: Inner Focus
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon is protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.

REAVOR.Pokedex: Only exceptionally aggressive or well-trained Pokémon will willingly engage one in combat. Its ripping pincers threaten to turn foes to shrapnel.

ARATTATA.Name: A. Rattata

Abilities.Name: Night Life
Abilities.Description: Doubles Speed in moonglow.

Abilities.Name: Gourmand
Abilities.Description: Gets a random pinch berry at the end of each turn if it has no item.

ARATTATA.Pokedex: It shows no interest in anything that isn't fresh. If you take it shopping with you, it will help you pick out ingredients.

ARATICATE.Name: A. Raticate

Abilities.Name: Night Life
Abilities.Description: Doubles Speed in moonglow.

Abilities.Name: Gourmand
Abilities.Description: Gets a random pinch berry at the end of each turn if it has no item.

ARATICATE.Pokedex: It makes its Rattata underlings gather food for it, dining solely on the most nutritious and delicious fare.

ARAICHU.Name: A. Raichu

Abilities.Name: Speed Boost
Abilities.Description: Speed is raised by two steps at the end of each of its turns.

Abilities.Name: Surf's Up
Abilities.Description: Powers up Water-type moves by 50%.

ARAICHU.Pokedex: It can loose 100,000-volt bursts of electricity, instantly downing foes several times its size.

ASANDSHREW.Name: A. Sandshrew

Abilities.Name: Skill Link
Abilities.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves.

Abilities.Name: Assault Spines
Abilities.Description: Doubles Sp. Def, but the Pokémon can't use status moves.

ASANDSHREW.Pokedex: Life on mountains covered with deep snow has granted this Pokémon a body of ice that's as hard as steel.

ASANDSLASH.Name: A. Sandslash

Abilities.Name: Skill Link
Abilities.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves.

Abilities.Name: Assault Spines
Abilities.Description: Doubles Sp. Def, but the Pokémon can't use status moves.

ASANDSLASH.Pokedex: It lives in snowy mountains on southern islands. When a blizzard rolls in, this Pokémon hunkers down in the snow to avoid getting blown away.

AVULPIX.Name: A. Vulpix

Abilities.Name: Summit Spirit
Abilities.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in hail.

Abilities.Name: Sudden Chill
Abilities.Description: Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to frostbite the attacker.

AVULPIX.Pokedex: In hot weather, this Pokémon makes ice shards with its six tails and sprays them around to cool itself off.

ANINETALES.Name: A. Ninetales

Abilities.Name: Summit Spirit
Abilities.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in hail.

Abilities.Name: Sudden Chill
Abilities.Description: Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to frostbite the attacker.

ANINETALES.Pokedex: It lives on mountains perpetually covered in snow and is revered as a deity incarnate. It appears draped in a blizzard.

ADIGLETT.Name: A. Diglett

Abilities.Name: Tangling Hair
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed by three steps.

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

ADIGLETT.Pokedex: Its head sports an altered form of whiskers made of metal. When in communication with its comrades, its whiskers wobble to and fro.

ADUGTRIO.Name: A. Dugtrio

Abilities.Name: Tangling Hair
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed by three steps.

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

ADUGTRIO.Pokedex: Its shining gold hair provides it with protection. It's reputed that keeping any of its fallen hairs will bring bad luck.

AMEOWTH.Name: A. Meowth

Abilities.Name: Fur Coat
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Defense.

Abilities.Name: Realist
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dragon- and Fairy-type attacks.

AMEOWTH.Pokedex: It's impulsive, selfish, and fickle. It's very popular with some Trainers who like giving it the attention it needs.

GMEOWTH.Name: G. Meowth

Abilities.Name: Slush Rush
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.

Abilities.Name: Steely Spirit
Abilities.Description: Powers up Steel-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.

GMEOWTH.Pokedex: These daring Pokémon have coins on their foreheads. Darker coins are harder, and harder coins garner more respect among Meowth.

APERSIAN.Name: A. Persian

Abilities.Name: Fur Coat
Abilities.Description: Doubles the Pokémon's Defense.

Abilities.Name: Realist
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dragon- and Fairy-type attacks.

APERSIAN.Pokedex: Its round face is a symbol of wealth. Persian that have bigger, plumper faces are considered more beautiful.

AGEODUDE.Name: A. Geodude

Abilities.Name: Galvanize
Abilities.Description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type and power up by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Arc Conductor
Abilities.Description: Inflicts 1/6th max HP damage to the foe when damaged during rain.

AGEODUDE.Pokedex: Geodude compete against each other with headbutts. The iron sand on their heads will stick to whichever one has stronger magnetism.

AGRAVELER.Name: A. Graveler

Abilities.Name: Galvanize
Abilities.Description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type and power up by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Arc Conductor
Abilities.Description: Inflicts 1/6th max HP damage to the foe when damaged during rain.

AGRAVELER.Pokedex: They eat rocks and often get into a scrap over them. The shock of Graveler smashing together causes a flash of light and a booming noise.

AGOLEM.Name: A. Golem

Abilities.Name: Galvanize
Abilities.Description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type and power up by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Arc Conductor
Abilities.Description: Inflicts 1/6th max HP damage to the foe when damaged during rain.

AGOLEM.Pokedex: It fires rocks charged with electricity. Even if the rock isn't fired that accurately, just grazing an opponent will cause numbness and fainting.

GPONYTA.Name: G. Ponyta

Abilities.Name: Joyous Sorrow
Abilities.Description: Uses Wish after knocking out any Pokémon.

Abilities.Name: Heart of Justice
Abilities.Description: Immune to Dark-type moves, and boosts both attacking stats when hit by one.

GPONYTA.Pokedex: This Pokémon will look into your eyes and read the contents of your heart. If it finds evil there, it promptly hides away.

GRAPIDASH.Name: G. Rapidash

Abilities.Name: Joyous Sorrow
Abilities.Description: Uses Wish after knocking out any Pokémon.

Abilities.Name: Heart of Justice
Abilities.Description: Immune to Dark-type moves, and boosts both attacking stats when hit by one.

GRAPIDASH.Pokedex: Brave and prideful, this Pokémon dashes airily through the forest, its steps aided by the psychic power stored in the fur on its fetlocks.

GSLOWPOKE.Name: G. Slowpoke

Abilities.Name: Gluttony
Abilities.Description: Eats pinch berries earlier than normal.

Abilities.Name: Mental Block
Abilities.Description: The Pokemon can't be Taunted, Encored, Tormented, Heal Blocked, Disabled, Barred, Dizzied, or Flinched.

GSLOWPOKE.Pokedex: Because Galarian Slowpoke eat the seeds of a plant that grows only in Galar, their tails have developed a spicy flavor.

GSLOWBRO.Name: G. Slowbro

Abilities.Name: Sniper
Abilities.Description: Doubles critical hit chance. Powers up critical hits by another 50%.

Abilities.Name: Merciless
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are critical against poisoned targets.

GSLOWBRO.Pokedex: If this Pokémon squeezes the tongue of the Shellder biting it, the Shellder will launch a toxic liquid from the tip of its shell.

GFARFETCHD.Name: G. Farfetch'd

Abilities.Name: Break Through
Abilities.Description: Moves ignore immunities due to typing.

Abilities.Name: Super Luck
Abilities.Description: Four times more likely for moves to be critical.

GFARFETCHD.Pokedex: The stalks of leeks are thicker and longer in the Galar region. Farfetch'd that adapted to these stalks took on a unique form.

AGRIMER.Name: A. Grimer

Abilities.Name: Power of Alchemy
Abilities.Description: When an ally faints, the Pokémon also gains their ability or abilities.

Abilities.Name: Gluttony
Abilities.Description: Eats pinch berries earlier than normal.

AGRIMER.Pokedex: A Grimer, which had been brought in to solve a problem with garbage, developed over time into this form.

AMUK.Name: A. Muk

Abilities.Name: Power of Alchemy
Abilities.Description: When an ally faints, the Pokémon also gains their ability or abilities.

Abilities.Name: Gluttony
Abilities.Description: Eats pinch berries earlier than normal.

AMUK.Pokedex: The garbage it eats causes continuous chemical changes in its body, which produce its exceedingly vivid coloration.

AEXEGGUTOR.Name: A. Exeggutor

Abilities.Name: Realist
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dragon- and Fairy-type attacks.

Abilities.Name: Sustainable
Abilities.Description: Upon entry in sunshine, regenerates its used berry.

AEXEGGUTOR.Pokedex: As it grew taller and taller, it outgrew its reliance on psychic powers, while within it awakened the power of the sleeping dragon.

AMAROWAK.Name: A. Marowak

Abilities.Name: Sealing Body
Abilities.Description: Moves used on the Pokémon are disabled for three turns.

Abilities.Name: Ancestral Dance
Abilities.Description: Raises both defensive stats whenever any Pokémon uses a dance move.

AMAROWAK.Pokedex: Its custom is to mourn its lost companions. Mounds of dirt by the side of the road mark the graves of the Marowak

GWEEZING.Name: G. Weezing

Abilities.Name: Midnight Oil
Abilities.Description: Using a status move in moonglow extends the weather by a turn.

Abilities.Name: Industrialize
Abilities.Description: Immune to Steel-type moves and raises Speed if hit by one.

GWEEZING.Pokedex: Long ago, during a time when droves of factories fouled the air with pollution, Weezing changed into this form for some reason.

GMRMIME.Name: G. Mr. Mime

Abilities.Name: Slapstick
Abilities.Description: Whenever a foe fails or misses, they take 1/8th HP damage.

Abilities.Name: Screen Cleaner
Abilities.Description: Screens are nullified when entering battle.

GMRMIME.Pokedex: It can radiate chilliness from the bottoms of its feet. It'll spend the whole day tap-dancing on a frozen floor.

GARTICUNO.Name: G. Articuno

Abilities.Name: Competitive
Abilities.Description: Raises Sp. Atk by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

GARTICUNO.Pokedex: Its feather-like blades are composed of psychic energy and can shear through thick iron sheets as if they were paper.

GZAPDOS.Name: G. Zapdos

Abilities.Name: Defiant
Abilities.Description: Raises Attack by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

GZAPDOS.Pokedex: One kick from its powerful legs will pulverize a dump truck. Supposedly, this Pokémon runs through the mountains at over 180 mph.

GMOLTRES.Name: G. Moltres

Abilities.Name: Berserk
Abilities.Description: Raises Atk and Sp. Atk by two steps each when its HP is lowered below half.

GMOLTRES.Pokedex: This Pokémon's sinister, flame-like aura will consume the spirit of any creature it hits. Victims become burned-out shadows of themselves.

GSLOWKING.Name: G. Slowking

Abilities.Name: Curious Medicine
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, clears the stat changes of other Pokémon.

Abilities.Name: Exorcist
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Psychic- and Ghost-type attacks.

GSLOWKING.Pokedex: Slowking can solve any problem present to it, but no one can understand a thing Slowking says.

GCORSOLA.Name: G. Corsola

Abilities.Name: Ecto-Particles
Abilities.Description: Restores HP based on damage from hail.

Abilities.Name: Perish Body
Abilities.Description: When it takes a hit, both Pokémon faint after 3 turns.

GCORSOLA.Pokedex: Sudden climate change wiped out this ancient kind of Corsola. This Pokémon absorbs others' life-force through its branches.

GZIGZAGOON.Name: G. Zigzagoon

Abilities.Name: Hooligan
Abilities.Description: Powers up recoil and sound moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

GZIGZAGOON.Pokedex: Thought to be the oldest form of Zigzagoon, it moves in zigzags and wreaks havoc upon its surroundings.

GLINOONE.Name: G. Linoone

Abilities.Name: Hooligan
Abilities.Description: Powers up recoil and sound moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

GLINOONE.Pokedex: This very aggressive Pokémon will recklessly challenge opponents stronger than itself.

GDARUMAKA.Name: G. Darumaka

Abilities.Name: Gorilla Tactics
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 50% but the user is locked into the first move they use.

GDARUMAKA.Pokedex: The colder they get, the more energetic they are. They freeze their breath to make snowballs, using them as ammo for playful snowball fights.

GDARMANITAN.Name: G. Darmanitan

Abilities.Name: Gorilla Tactics
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 50% but the user is locked into the first move they use.

GDARMANITAN.Pokedex: Though it has a gentle disposition, it's also very strong. It will quickly freeze the snowball on its head before going for a headbutt.

GYAMASK.Name: G. Yamask

Abilities.Name: Wandering Spirit
Abilities.Description: Taking a physical hit exchanges Abilities.

Abilities.Name: Sand Stream
Abilities.Description: Summons a sandstorm for 4 turns when it enters battle.

GYAMASK.Pokedex: It's said that this Pokémon was formed when an ancient clay tablet was drawn to a vengeful spirit.

GSTUNFISK.Name: G. Stunfisk

Abilities.Name: Deep Teeth
Abilities.Description: Foes aren't released from its trapping moves even when the Pokémon leaves the field.

Abilities.Name: Deterrent
Abilities.Description: Enemies which swap in take damage equal to 1/8th their HP.

GSTUNFISK.Pokedex: Its conspicuous lips lure prey in as it lies in wait in the mud. When prey gets close, Stunfisk clamps its jagged steel fins down on them.

WYRDEER.Name: Wyrdeer

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

WYRDEER.Pokedex: The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pokémon is erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains heat well.

URSALUNA.Name: Ursaluna

Abilities.Name: Moon Basking
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in moonglow.

Abilities.Name: Tough
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fighting- and Rock-type moves.

URSALUNA.Pokedex: It is believed that the swampy terrain of its ancient home region gave Ursaluna its burly physique and capacity to manipulate peat at will.

KLEAVOR.Name: Kleavor

Abilities.Name: Swordplay
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of blade moves by 30%.

Abilities.Name: Weak Armor
Abilities.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon raise its Speed by two steps but lower its Defense.

KLEAVOR.Pokedex: A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes and shields itself with hard stone.

BASCULEGION.Name: Basculegion

Abilities.Name: Juggernaut
Abilities.Description: Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves or activate after hitting the target.

Abilities.Name: Expertise
Abilities.Description: Powers up super-effective moves by 30%.

BASCULEGION.Pokedex: Clads itself in the souls of comrades that perished before fulfilling their goals of journeying upstream.

HTYPHLOSION.Name: H. Typhlosion

Abilities.Name: Fiery Spirit
Abilities.Description: Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to burn the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Exorcist
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Psychic- and Ghost-type attacks.

HTYPHLOSION.Pokedex: Said to purify lost, forsaken souls with its flames and guide them to the afterlife. Its form had been influenced by the energy of Mt. Coronet.

HSAMUROTT.Name: H. Samurott

Abilities.Name: Poor Conduct
Abilities.Description: Upon switch out, lowers the foe's Attack and Sp. Atk stat by insulting them.

Abilities.Name: Swordplay
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of blade moves by 30%.

HSAMUROTT.Pokedex: Hard of heart and deft of blade, its turbulent blows crash into foes like ceaseless pounding waves.

HDECIDUEYE.Name: H. Decidueye

Abilities.Name: Taiga Trekker
Abilities.Description: During hail, boosts Speed and Grass-type damage by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Feather Coat
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Ice- and Flying-type attacks.

HDECIDUEYE.Pokedex: The air stored inside the rachises of Decidueye's feathers insulated the Pokémon against Hisui's extreme cold.

HBRAVIARY.Name: H. Braviary

Abilities.Name: Feather Coat
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Ice- and Flying-type attacks.

Abilities.Name: Sleetshaker
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 30% in hailstorms.

HBRAVIARY.Pokedex: Screaming a bloodcurdling battle cry, this huge and ferocious bird Pokémon went out on the hunt.

HSLIGGOO.Name: H. Sliggoo

Abilities.Name: Clingy
Abilities.Description: Prevents foes with status conditions from fleeing.

Abilities.Name: Impetuous
Abilities.Description: Special attacks against the Pokémon raise its Speed by two steps but lower its Sp. Def.

HSLIGGOO.Pokedex: A creature given to melancholy. I suspect its metallic shell developed as a result of the mucus on its skin reacting with the iron in Hisui's water.

HGOODRA.Name: H. Goodra

Abilities.Name: Clingy
Abilities.Description: Prevents foes with status conditions from fleeing.

Abilities.Name: Impetuous
Abilities.Description: Special attacks against the Pokémon raise its Speed by two steps but lower its Sp. Def.

HGOODRA.Pokedex: Able to freely control the hardness of its metallic shell. It loathes solitude and is extremely clingy-it will fume and run riot if those dearest to it ever leave its side.

HLILLIGANT.Name: H. Lilligant

Abilities.Name: Fascinate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Efflorescent
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon and its allies are protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.

HLILLIGANT.Pokedex: Its well-developed legs were the result of a life spent on mountains covered in deep snow. The scent it exudes from its flower crown heartens those in proximity.

HAVALUGG.Name: H. Avalugg

Abilities.Name: Ram Prow
Abilities.Description: Ignores screens, Substitute, and Abilities that would affect its moves.

Abilities.Name: Follow Through
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by two steps after knocking out any Pokémon.

HAVALUGG.Pokedex: This Pokémon barrels along steep mountain paths, cleaving through the deep snow with its hard icy armor.

HGROWLITHE.Name: H. Growlithe

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Rock Head
Abilities.Description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

HGROWLITHE.Pokedex: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.

HARCANINE.Name: H. Arcanine

Abilities.Name: Intimidate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Attack stat by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Rock Head
Abilities.Description: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.

HARCANINE.Pokedex: Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of majesty. Anyone hearing it can't help but grovel before it.

HSNEASEL.Name: H. Sneasel

Abilities.Name: Tough
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fighting- and Rock-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

HSNEASEL.Pokedex: Its sturdy, curved claws are ideal for traversing precipitous cliffs. From the tips of these claws drips a nerve-destroying venom.

SNEASLER.Name: Sneasler

Abilities.Name: Tough
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Fighting- and Rock-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Frustrate
Abilities.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

SNEASLER.Pokedex: Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical prowess, no other species could hope to best it on frozen highlands.

HVOLTORB.Name: H. Voltorb

Abilities.Name: Perennial Payload
Abilities.Description: After fainting from exploding, revives after six turns.

Abilities.Name: Apricorn Armor
Abilities.Description: Takes 50% less damage from attacks by Pokémon who have a status condition.

HVOLTORB.Pokedex: When excited, it discharges the electric current it has stored in its belly, then lets out a great, uproarious laugh.

HELECTRODE.Name: H. Electrode

Abilities.Name: Perennial Payload
Abilities.Description: After fainting from exploding, revives after six turns.

Abilities.Name: Apricorn Armor
Abilities.Description: Takes 50% less damage from attacks by Pokémon who have a status condition.

HELECTRODE.Pokedex: The tissue on the surface of its body is curiously similar in composition to an Apricorn.

HZORUA.Name: H. Zorua

Abilities.Name: Illusion
Abilities.Description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

Abilities.Name: Mental Block
Abilities.Description: The Pokemon can't be Taunted, Encored, Tormented, Heal Blocked, Disabled, Barred, Dizzied, or Flinched.

HZORUA.Pokedex: A once-departed soul, returned to life. Derives power from resentment, which rises as energy atop its head and takes on the forms of foes.

HZOROARK.Name: H. Zoroark

Abilities.Name: Illusion
Abilities.Description: Comes out disguised as the Pokémon in back.

Abilities.Name: Mental Block
Abilities.Description: The Pokemon can't be Taunted, Encored, Tormented, Heal Blocked, Disabled, Barred, Dizzied, or Flinched.

HZOROARK.Pokedex: It likes to settle grudges and fulfill final wishes. It does so to ensure peaceful passage to the afterlife.

HQWILFISH.Name: H. Qwilfish

Abilities.Name: Poison Point
Abilities.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to poison the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Venom Gorger
Abilities.Description: Whenever a foe's poison worsens, the Pokémon heals for 25% max HP.

HQWILFISH.Pokedex: Fishers detest this troublesome Pokémon because it sprays poison from its spines, getting it everywhere.

OVERQWIL.Name: Overqwil

Abilities.Name: Poison Point
Abilities.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to poison the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Venom Gorger
Abilities.Description: Whenever a foe's poison worsens, the Pokémon heals for 25% max HP.

OVERQWIL.Pokedex: Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the nickname "sea fiend." It slurps up poison to nourish itself.

ENAMORUS.Name: Enamorus

Abilities.Name: Contrary
Abilities.Description: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

ENAMORUS.Pokedex: According to legend, this Pokémon's love gave rise to the budding of fresh life across Hisui.

ANNIHILAPE.Name: Annihilape

Abilities.Name: Defiant
Abilities.Description: Raises Attack by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

Abilities.Name: Dominating
Abilities.Description: After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Attack and Defense.

ANNIHILAPE.Pokedex: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this Pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.

FARIGIRAF.Name: Farigiraf

Abilities.Name: Cud Chew
Abilities.Description: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it will regurgitate that Berry at the end of the next turn and eat it one more time.

Abilities.Name: Phase Shift
Abilities.Description: The Pokemon's moves deal 50% more damage if they're a different type than last.

FARIGIRAF.Pokedex: Now that the brain waves from the head and tail are synced up, the psychic power of this Pokémon is 10 times stronger than Girafarig’s.

DUDUNSPARCE.Name: Dudunsparce

Abilities.Name: Serene Grace
Abilities.Description: Doubles the likelihood of the user's random added effects activating.

Abilities.Name: Adapted
Abilities.Description: Powers up moves of the same type by 33%.

DUDUNSPARCE.Pokedex: This Pokémon uses its hard tail to make its nest by boring holes into bedrock deep underground. The nest can reach lengths of over six miles.

KINGAMBIT.Name: Kingambit

Abilities.Name: Defiant
Abilities.Description: Raises Attack by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

Abilities.Name: Sturdy
Abilities.Description: It can't be knocked out with one hit.

KINGAMBIT.Pokedex: Only a Bisharp that stands above all others in its vast army can evolve into Kingambit.

MZANGOOSE.Name: M. Zangoose

Abilities.Name: Served Cold
Abilities.Description: Boosts Attack by 20% in Hail, or 40% if also below half health.

Abilities.Name: Mental Damage
Abilities.Description: Disables the opponent's most recently-used move for three turns upon hitting it.

MZANGOOSE.Pokedex: Even being bisected by a Seviper's tail couldn't quell its rage. It attacks enemies on a physical and spiritual level simultaneously.

MSENTRET.Name: M. Sentret

Abilities.Name: Filter
Abilities.Description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks by 25%.

Abilities.Name: Apprehensive
Abilities.Description: Takes 30% less damage in eclipse, except in Total Eclipse.

MSENTRET.Pokedex: The eye on its stomach enables its psychic powers and never blinks. Dirt and dust are telekinetically repelled.

MFURRET.Name: M. Furret

Abilities.Name: Filter
Abilities.Description: Reduces damage from super-effective attacks by 25%.

Abilities.Name: Apprehensive
Abilities.Description: Takes 30% less damage in eclipse, except in Total Eclipse.

MFURRET.Pokedex: It burrows at night, leaving only the eye on its stomach exposed. The eye will stare into space while the rest of it sleeps.

MSEVIPER.Name: M. Seviper

Abilities.Name: Tesla Coils
Abilities.Description: Becomes charged upon entry, doubling the power of its next Electric-type attack.

Abilities.Name: Envy
Abilities.Description: The Pokémon's moves have priority against single targets with increased stats.

MSEVIPER.Pokedex: Its iron body is impenetrable to nearly all attacks. When coiled, it can fire metal projectiles using magnetic induction.

MTANGELA.Name: M. Tangela

Abilities.Name: Petrifying
Abilities.Description: Special attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to cause numbing.

Abilities.Name: Rock Body
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn during sandstorm.

MTANGELA.Pokedex: Though it looks like a plant, its green color comes from its jade scales. Looking into its eyes is said to bring three years of bad luck.

MTANGROWTH.Name: M. Tangrowth

Abilities.Name: Petrifying
Abilities.Description: Special attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to cause numbing.

Abilities.Name: Rock Body
Abilities.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn during sandstorm.

MTANGROWTH.Pokedex: While the snakes covering it are hard as granite, its skin is soft. Predators attacking its unprotected limbs have to contend with its powerful digging claws.

MVULPIX.Name: M. Vulpix

Abilities.Name: Gild
Abilities.Description: Turns the held item of a Pokémon it hits into gold coins for you to take.

Abilities.Name: Luxury Taste
Abilities.Description: At end of turn, heals 1/8th HP if holding a clothing item.

MVULPIX.Pokedex: It constantly demands treats and gifts from its Trainer. An expensive and fashionable hoard is necessary for evolution.

MNINETALES.Name: M. Ninetales

Abilities.Name: Gild
Abilities.Description: Turns the held item of a Pokémon it hits into gold coins for you to take.

Abilities.Name: Luxury Taste
Abilities.Description: At end of turn, heals 1/8th HP if holding a clothing item.

MNINETALES.Pokedex: The gifts it received have become a tail of golden light. It weaponizes pure avaricious energy in battle, gaining in power as it is pampered.

MSINISTEA.Name: M. Sinistea

Abilities.Name: Refreshments
Abilities.Description: Upon entry during sunshine, heals the lowest HP ally or self by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Chill Out
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to frostbite targets when using special moves.

MSINISTEA.Pokedex: It spends days relaxing on the beach. Its rest is often interrupted by someone who confuses it for a drink.

MPOLTEAGEIST.Name: M. Polteageist

Abilities.Name: Refreshments
Abilities.Description: Upon entry during sunshine, heals the lowest HP ally or self by 50%.

Abilities.Name: Chill Out
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to frostbite targets when using special moves.

MPOLTEAGEIST.Pokedex: Despite its refreshing scent, those who drink of its colorful liquid are swiftly put into a deep sleep.

MWURMPLE.Name: M. Wurmple

Abilities.Name: Sudden Chill
Abilities.Description: Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to frostbite the attacker.

Abilities.Name: Flame Body
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to burn the attacker.

MWURMPLE.Pokedex: Its horns efficiently regulate its body temperature. It seeks out Fire- and Ice-type predators to charge itself with energy for evolution.

MSILCOON.Name: M. Silcoon

Abilities.Name: Sudden Chill
Abilities.Description: Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to frostbite the attacker.

MSILCOON.Pokedex: Its silk makes it blend in with snowy rocks. If attacked, its only recourse is to make itself unappetizing by chilling its own body.

MBEAUTIFLY.Name: M. Beautifly

Abilities.Name: Bitter
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are critical against frostbitten targets.

Abilities.Name: Schadenfreude
Abilities.Description: Restores 1/4th health after any foe faints.

MBEAUTIFLY.Pokedex: It is less hostile than the Hoennian form, but vicious towards former predators. Its mouthparts inject a fluid similar to liquid nitrogen.

MCASCOON.Name: M. Cascoon

Abilities.Name: Flame Body
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to burn the attacker.

MCASCOON.Pokedex: Its flame is kept burning by an organ similar to a Bunsen burner. Curious Pokémon often try to put it out, to no avail.

MDUSTOX.Name: M. Dustox

Abilities.Name: Harsh
Abilities.Description: Its attacks are critical against burned targets.

Abilities.Name: Follow Through
Abilities.Description: Raises Speed by two steps after knocking out any Pokémon.

MDUSTOX.Pokedex: Its abdomen is actually a sophisticated torch drive. Their migrations can be tracked by following broken trees left by supersonic flybys.

MROGGENROLA.Name: M. Roggenrola

Abilities.Name: Time Interloper
Abilities.Description: Its attacks have priority, deal 25% less damage and become special.

Abilities.Name: Space Interloper
Abilities.Description: Attacks hit twice for half damage, drain 25% of damage dealt and become special.

MROGGENROLA.Pokedex: It was first unearthed in forbidden lands. Its body doesn't abide by the physical laws of this universe.

MBOLDORE.Name: M. Boldore

Abilities.Name: Time Interloper
Abilities.Description: Its attacks have priority, deal 25% less damage and become special.

Abilities.Name: Space Interloper
Abilities.Description: Attacks hit twice for half damage, drain 25% of damage dealt and become special.

MBOLDORE.Pokedex: It is more comfortable in alien dimensions than on Earth. The rocky parts of its body can't be analyzed by modern science.

MGIGALITH.Name: M. Gigalith

Abilities.Name: Time Interloper
Abilities.Description: Its attacks have priority, deal 25% less damage and become special.

Abilities.Name: Space Interloper
Abilities.Description: Attacks hit twice for half damage, drain 25% of damage dealt and become special.

MGIGALITH.Pokedex: They can't be understood or predicted, making them dangerous opponents. At the end of their lifespan they return to their home universe, reporting to a higher will.

MHOOTHOOT.Name: M. Hoothoot

Abilities.Name: Sentry
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage while using a status move.

Abilities.Name: Winter Insulation
Abilities.Description: During hail, immune to Fire- and Electric-type moves.

MHOOTHOOT.Pokedex: Its down insulates it against any cold. In winter it will lay dormant beneath snow banks, only to pop out during spring.

MNOCTOWL.Name: M. Noctowl

Abilities.Name: Sentry
Abilities.Description: Takes 25% less damage while using a status move.

Abilities.Name: Winter Insulation
Abilities.Description: During hail, immune to Fire- and Electric-type moves.

MNOCTOWL.Pokedex: When its shadow passes over someone, they feel a horrible chill. Some Trainers find it invigorating.

MGOLDEEN.Name: M. Goldeen

Abilities.Name: Irrefutable
Abilities.Description: Raises Attack by two steps after dealing not-very-effective or barely-effective damage.

Abilities.Name: Unafraid
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dark- and Bug-type moves.

MGOLDEEN.Pokedex: They obsessively count the pebbles in their rivers, becoming irate if the result is an unlucky number.

MSEAKING.Name: M. Seaking

Abilities.Name: Irrefutable
Abilities.Description: Raises Attack by two steps after dealing not-very-effective or barely-effective damage.

Abilities.Name: Unafraid
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dark- and Bug-type moves.

MSEAKING.Pokedex: Fearsome Pokémon lining a river in a grand procession is a sign of a Makyan Seaking. They offer endless blessings in exchange for servitude.

MPETILIL.Name: M. Petilil

Abilities.Name: Tangling Hair
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed by three steps.

Abilities.Name: Petty
Abilities.Description: Whenever a foe raises their stats, the Pokémon follows suit.

MPETILIL.Pokedex: It seems to pride itself on living in inhospitable conditions. If others take up residence nearby, it will move to even colder climes.

MLILLIGANT.Name: M. Lilligant

Abilities.Name: Tangling Hair
Abilities.Description: Physical moves against it lower the attacker's Speed by three steps.

Abilities.Name: Petty
Abilities.Description: Whenever a foe raises their stats, the Pokémon follows suit.

MLILLIGANT.Pokedex: It utters royal proclamations and tyrannical edicts on a whim, becoming petulant when its disobedient subjects can't understand it.

MCARNIVINE.Name: M. Carnivine

Abilities.Name: Archvillain
Abilities.Description: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack by 50%, but its attacks cannot faint the target.

Abilities.Name: Pestilent
Abilities.Description: While the Pokémon is below half health, its attacks leech those hit.

MCARNIVINE.Pokedex: It hunts other nocturnal predators, trapping them with its sticky tendrils. Its maniacal laugh is a common sound on autumn nights.

MVULLABY.Name: M. Vullaby

Abilities.Name: Sealing Body
Abilities.Description: Moves used on the Pokémon are disabled for three turns.

Abilities.Name: Toil and Trouble
Abilities.Description: Foes suffer 50% more stat reduction from burn, frostbite, and numb.

MVULLABY.Pokedex: It stomps on smaller opponents with its powerful legs, sometimes toppling in the process. If its house is broken, terrible wailing emits until it is repaired.

MMANDIBUZZ.Name: M. Mandibuzz

Abilities.Name: Sealing Body
Abilities.Description: Moves used on the Pokémon are disabled for three turns.

Abilities.Name: Toil and Trouble
Abilities.Description: Foes suffer 50% more stat reduction from burn, frostbite, and numb.

MMANDIBUZZ.Pokedex: It steeps the remains of prey within the jar it protects, stirring the concoction with its claws. Folklore says its soul is kept within the diseased mass.

MMUNNA.Name: M. Munna

Abilities.Name: Slumbering Drake
Abilities.Description: Falls asleep upon entry, but raises all of its stats by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Fatigued
Abilities.Description: After attacking any foe, the Pokémon immediately uses Rest.

MMUNNA.Pokedex: When a Munna egg is placed in the care of a brooding dragon, it hatches into this form. It will repeatedly headbutt Togepi if placed near one.

MMUSHARNA.Name: M. Musharna

Abilities.Name: Slumbering Drake
Abilities.Description: Falls asleep upon entry, but raises all of its stats by two steps.

Abilities.Name: Fatigued
Abilities.Description: After attacking any foe, the Pokémon immediately uses Rest.

MMUSHARNA.Pokedex: Excess psychic energy is vented as smoke from the hole where its gem once was. Its heart functions as a second brain that lets it communicate telepathically.

MFRILLISH.Name: M. Frillish

Abilities.Name: Ruinous
Abilities.Description: All Pokémon deal 40% more move damage.

Abilities.Name: No Hope
Abilities.Description: Prevents foes whose Attack is less than its from fleeing.

MFRILLISH.Pokedex: They are drawn to mysterious machinery and internet influencers. Because of this, they are common in online horror media.

MJELLICENT.Name: M. Jellicent

Abilities.Name: Ruinous
Abilities.Description: All Pokémon deal 40% more move damage.

Abilities.Name: No Hope
Abilities.Description: Prevents foes whose Attack is less than its from fleeing.

MJELLICENT.Pokedex: They led explorers to an ancient sunken city in the abyss. Its people had uploaded their minds into machines that slowly failed over the ages.

PORYGONMAV.Name: Porygon-MAV

Abilities.Name: Unafraid
Abilities.Description: Takes half damage from Dark- and Bug-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Swordplay
Abilities.Description: Boosts the power of blade moves by 30%.

PORYGONMAV.Pokedex: Rely on LuxTech's literal firewall! Featuring a unique* typing and cutting-edge network threat purgation protocols, this innovative new form has your back.

MAROMATISSE.Name: M. Aromatisse

Abilities.Name: Reap What You Sow
Abilities.Description: If the Pokémon faints from Perish Song, it is revived in a new form.

Abilities.Name: Uncanny Luck
Abilities.Description: If an attacker would activate a random added effect on the Pokémon, that effect is placed on the attacker instead.

MAROMATISSE.Pokedex: It uses both white and black magic. It harvests the flowers that grow on witches who regularly walk between life and death.
